GE07hv_conau:7: PADA MARKERS For a four-pada verse:
GE07hv_conau:9: [h: HV (CE) chapter 1, transliterated by Peter Schreiner (ca. 1991),
GE07hv_conau:12: devīṃ sarasvatīṃ caiva % tato jayam udīrayet // HV_0.0 //
GE07hv_conau:13: [k: "This mantra is found only in N (except Ñ1 D6). [...] After the introductory mantra, K2 ins. *1, *2 and *3. K3 ins. *1, *5, and *3. K4
GE07hv_conau:29: asac ca sadasac caiva $ yad viśvaṃ sadasatparam |
GE07hv_conau:31: maṅgalyaṃ maṅgalam viṣṇuṃ $ vareṇyam anaghaṃ śucim |
GE07hv_conau:36: jajñe bahujñaṃ param atyudāraṃ $ yaṃ dvīpamadhye sutam ātmayogāt |
GE07hv_conau:38: yo gośataṃ kanakaśṛṅgamayaṃ dadāti $ viprāya vedaviduṣe bahuviśrutāya
GE07hv_conau:39: puṇyāṃ ca bhāratakathāṃ śṛṇuyāc ca tadvat $ tulyaṃ phalaṃ bhavati
GE07hv_conau:41: śatāśvamedhasya yad atra puṇyaṃ $ catuḥsahasrasya śatakratoś ca |
GE07hv_conau:42: bhaved anantaṃ harivaṃśadānāt $ prakīrtitaṃ vyāsamaharṣiṇā ca |
GE07hv_conau:43: yad vājapeyena tu rājasūyād $ dṛṣṭaṃ phalaṃ hastirathena cānyat |
GE07hv_conau:44: tal labhyate vyāsavacaḥ pramāṇaṃ $ gītaṃ ca vālmīkimaharṣiṇā ca |
GE07hv_conau:47: yo bhārataṃ samadhigacchati vācyamānaṃ $ kiṃ tasya puṣkarajalair
GE07hv_conau:49: yo harivaṃśaṃ lekhayati yathāvidhinā mahātapāḥ sapadi |
GE07hv_conau:50: sa yāti hareḥ padakamalaṃ kamalaṃ madhupo yathā lubdhaḥ |
GE07hv_conau:51: yaṃ brahma vedāntavido vadanti $ paraṃ pradhānaṃ puruṣaṃ tathānye |
GE07hv_conau:52: viśvād gateḥ kāraṇam īśvaraṃ sa $ tasmai namo vighnavināśanāya |
GE07hv_conau:56: yo dadāti harivaṃśapustakaṃ $ brāhmaṇāya viduṣe sadakṣiṇam |
GE07hv_conau:57: so 'śvamedhaphalabhāg bhaven naraḥ $ satyam eva kathitaṃ maharṣiṇā |
GE07hv_conau:58: cakraṃ yasya bhujāgrahastalalitaṃ vidyutprabhaṃ rājate $ śaṅkho yasya virājate karatale saṃpūrṇacandraprabhaḥ |
GE07hv_conau:59: mālā yasya sacampakā satilakā sāśokanīlotpalā $ sa tvāṃ pātu
GE07hv_conau:61: yo 'vidyādyair aśeṣair manasi vinihitaiḥ kleśasaṃjñais tridoṣair $
GE07hv_conau:65: jitaṃ te puṇḍarīkākṣa $ namas te viśvabhāvana |
GE07hv_conau:70: yaṃ natvā kṛtakṛtyāḥ syus $ taṃ namāmi gajānanam |
GE07hv_conau:72: dadyād amandam ānandam $ acirān no nṛkesarī |
GE07hv_conau:81: namo vai brahmanidhaye $ vāsiṣṭhāya namo namaḥ |
GE07hv_conau:84: bhāratānāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ % pārthivānāṃ tathaiva ca // HV_1.1 //
GE07hv_conau:86: daityānām atha siddhānāṃ % guhyakānāṃ tathaiva ca // HV_1.2 //
GE07hv_conau:88: vicitrāś ca kathāyogā % janma cāgryam anuttamam // HV_1.3 //
GE07hv_conau:89: kathitaṃ bhavatā puṇyaṃ $ purāṇaṃ ślakṣṇayā girā &
GE07hv_conau:90: manaḥkarṇasukhaṃ tan māṃ % prīṇāty amṛtasaṃmitam // HV_1.4 //
GE07hv_conau:91: tatra janma kurūṇāṃ vai $ tvayoktaṃ lomaharṣiṇe &
GE07hv_conau:92: na tu vṛṣṇyandhakānāṃ vai % tad bhavān prabravītu me // HV_1.5 //
GE07hv_conau:94: janamejayena yat pṛṣṭaḥ $ śiṣyo vyāsasya dhīmataḥ &
GE07hv_conau:96: dharmavit kathayām āsa $ kulaṃ teṣāṃ savistaram |
GE07hv_conau:97: tat te 'haṃ saṃpravakṣyāmi % vṛṣṇīnāṃ vaṃśam āditaḥ // HV_1.6 //
GE07hv_conau:101: kathitaṃ bhavatā vipra % vistareṇa mayā śrutam // HV_1.8 //
GE07hv_conau:105: tatra tatra samāsena % vistareṇaiva cābhibho // HV_1.10 //
GE07hv_conau:106: na ca me tṛptir astīha $ kīrtyamāne purātane &
GE07hv_conau:107: ekaś ca me mato rāśir % vṛṣṇayaḥ pāṇḍavās tathā // HV_1.11 //
GE07hv_conau:109: kathayasva kulaṃ teṣāṃ % vistareṇa tapodhana // HV_1.12 //
GE07hv_conau:110: yasya yasyānvaye ye ye $ tāṃs tān icchāmi veditum &
GE07hv_conau:112: pūrvaṃ kathā samākhyātā $ vicitrā ca mahīpate |
GE07hv_conau:113: teṣāṃ pūrvavisṛṣṭiṃ ca % vicitrām ā prajāpateḥ // HV_1.13 //
GE07hv_conau:117: yena vai śṛṇvatāṃ puṃsām $ aputratvaṃ praṇaśyati |
GE07hv_conau:118: [k: T4 cont. after *25, T2.3 G1 ins. after 12, D2 G4 ins. after 13:
GE07hv_conau:122: satkṛtya paripṛṣṭas tu $ sa mahātmā mahātapāḥ &
GE07hv_conau:123: vistareṇānupūrvyā ca % kathayām āsa tāṃ kathām // HV_1.14 //
GE07hv_conau:125: śṛṇu rājan kathāṃ divyāṃ $ puṇyāṃ pāpapraṇāśinīm &
GE07hv_conau:126: kathyamānāṃ mayā citrāṃ % bahvarthāṃ śrutisaṃmitām // HV_1.15 //
GE07hv_conau:127: yaś caināṃ dhārayet tāta $ śṛṇuyād vāpy abhīkṣṇaśaḥ &
GE07hv_conau:129: yaś caināṃ dhārayed vipraḥ $ śrāvayed vā mahātmanām |
GE07hv_conau:131: avyaktaṃ kāraṇaṃ yat tan $ nityaṃ sadasadātmakam &
GE07hv_conau:132: pradhānaṃ puruṣaṃ tasmān % nirmame viśvam īśvaraḥ // HV_1.17 //
GE07hv_conau:133: taṃ vai viddhi mahārāja $ brahmāṇam amitaujasam &
GE07hv_conau:135: ahaṃkaras tu mahatas $ tasmād bhūtāni jajñire &
GE07hv_conau:136: bhūtabhedāś ca bhūtebhya % iti sargaḥ sanātanaḥ // HV_1.19 //
GE07hv_conau:138: kīrtyamānaṃ śṛṇu mayā % pūrveṣāṃ kīrtivardhanam // HV_1.20 //
GE07hv_conau:141: tasmāt kalyāya te kalyaḥ $ samagraṃ śucaye śuciḥ &
GE07hv_conau:148: ā vṛṣṇivaṃśād vakṣyāmi % bhūtasargam anuttamam // HV_1.22 //
GE07hv_conau:149: viṣṇuḥ svayaṃbhūr bhagavān $ sisṛkṣur vividhāḥ prajāḥ &
GE07hv_conau:150: apa eva sasarjādau % tāsu vīryam avāsṛjat // HV_1.23 //
GE07hv_conau:151: āpo nārā iti proktā $ nāmnā pūrvam iti śrutiḥ &
GE07hv_conau:152: ayanaṃ tasya tāḥ pūrvaṃ % tena nārāyaṇaḥ smṛtaḥ // HV_1.24 //
GE07hv_conau:154: tatra jajñe svayaṃ brahmā % svayaṃbhūr iti naḥ śrutam // HV_1.25 //
GE07hv_conau:156: tad aṇḍam akarod dvaidhaṃ % divaṃ bhuvam athāpi ca // HV_1.26 //
GE07hv_conau:157: tayoḥ śakalyor madhyam $ ākāśam akarot prabhuḥ &
GE07hv_conau:158: apsu pāriplavāṃ pṛthvīṃ % diśaś ca daśadhā dadhe // HV_1.27 //
GE07hv_conau:159: tatra kālaṃ mano vācaṃ $ kāmaṃ krodham atho ratim &
GE07hv_conau:160: sasarja sṛṣṭiṃ tadrūpāṃ % sraṣṭum icchan prajāpatim // HV_1.28 //
GE07hv_conau:162: vasiṣṭhaṃ ca mahātejāḥ % so 'sṛjat sapta mānasān // HV_1.29 //
GE07hv_conau:163: sapta brahmāṇa ity ete $ purāṇe niścayaṃ gatāḥ &
GE07hv_conau:166: sanatkumāraṃ ca ṛṣiṃ % pūrveṣām api pūrvajam // HV_1.31 //
GE07hv_conau:168: sapta tv ete prajāyante $ prajā rudraś ca bhārata &
GE07hv_conau:169: skandaḥ sanatkumāraś ca % tejaḥ saṃkṣipya tiṣṭhataḥ // HV_1.32 //
GE07hv_conau:174: sanaś ca yogatattvajñaṃ $ sanakaṃ ca sanandanam |
GE07hv_conau:176: yādāṃsi ca sasarjādau % parjanyaṃ ca sasarja ha // HV_1.34 //
GE07hv_conau:178: [k: Ś1 K V2 Dn D3(marg.).4 ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conau:179: mukhād devān ajanayat $ pitṝṃś ceśo 'pi vakṣasaḥ |
GE07hv_conau:180: prajanāc ca manuṣyān vai $ jaghanān nirmame 'surān |
GE07hv_conau:181: sādhyāṃs tair ayajan devān % ity evam anuśuśrumaḥ // HV_1.35 //
GE07hv_conau:184: brahmāṇaṃ hṛdayaṃ bhittvā $ niścito bhagavān bhṛguḥ || *HV_1.36*33:1
GE07hv_conau:185: stanaṃ tu dakṣiṇaṃ bhittvā $ brahmajena ca vigrahaḥ |
GE07hv_conau:188: kāmaḥ śamaś ca harṣaś ca $ tejasā lokadhāriṇaḥ || *HV_1.36*33:5 |
GE07hv_conau:189: kāmasya tu ratir bhāryā $ śamasya prītir aṅganā |
GE07hv_conau:190: nandā bhāryā ca harṣasya $ trayo lokāḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥ |
GE07hv_conau:191: āpavasya prajāsargaṃ % sṛjato hi prajāpateḥ // HV_1.36 //
GE07hv_conau:192: [k: Ś1 K Dn D3(marg.).4 G4 M2 ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conau:193: sṛjyamānāḥ prajā naiva $ vivardhante yadā tadā |
GE07hv_conau:195: ardhena nārī tasyāṃ sa % sasṛje vividhāḥ prajāḥ \
GE07hv_conau:196: divaṃ ca pṛthivīṃ caiva mahimnā vyāpya tiṣṭati // HV_1.37 //
GE07hv_conau:197: virājam asṛjad viṣṇuḥ $ so 'sṛjat puruṣaṃ virāṭ &
GE07hv_conau:198: puruṣaṃ taṃ manuṃ viddhi % tad vai manvantaraṃ smṛtam \
GE07hv_conau:199: dvitīyam āpavasyaitan manor antaram ucyate // HV_1.38 //
GE07hv_conau:200: sa vairājaḥ prajāsargaṃ $ sasarja puruṣaḥ prabhuḥ &
GE07hv_conau:202: manuṃ prajāpatiṃ viddhi $ sasarja prabhur īśvaraḥ |
GE07hv_conau:203: nārāyaṇavisargaḥ sa % prajās tasyāpy ayonijāḥ // HV_1.39 //
GE07hv_conau:204: āyuṣmān kīrtimān dhanyaḥ $ prajāvāṃś ca bhaven naraḥ &
GE07hv_conau:206: sthiravaṃśaś ca bhavati $ mṛtaḥ svarge mahīyate |
GE07hv_conau:207: ādisargaṃ viditvemaṃ % yatheṣṭāṃ prāpnuyād gatim // HV_1.40 //
GE07hv_conau:208: [h: HV (CE) chapter 2, transliterated by Peter Schreiner; version of February 13, 2002. Not yet proof-read. :h]
GE07hv_conau:210: sa sṛṣṭāsu prajāsv evam $ āpavo vai prajāpatiḥ &
GE07hv_conau:211: lebhe vai puruṣaḥ patnīṃ % śatarūpām ayonijām // HV_2.1 //
GE07hv_conau:212: āpavasya mahimnā tu $ divam āvṛtya tiṣṭhataḥ &
GE07hv_conau:214: sā tu varṣāyutaṃ taptvā $ tapaḥ paramaduścaram &
GE07hv_conau:216: sa vai svāyaṃbhuvas tāta $ puruṣo manur ucyate &
GE07hv_conau:223: kāmyāputrāś ca catvāraḥ % samrāṭ kukṣir virāṭ prabhuḥ // HV_2.6 //
GE07hv_conau:224: [k: K2-4,Ñ2.3,V,B1.2,D(D3 marg.),T3.4 ins., after 6; B3 after 6ab:
GE07hv_conau:228: uttānapādāc caturaḥ % sūnṛtā suṣuve sutān // HV_2.7 //
GE07hv_conau:229: dharmasya kanyā suśroṇī $ sūnṛtā nāma viśrutā &
GE07hv_conau:230: utpannā vāci dharmeṇa % dhruvasya jananī śubhā // HV_2.8 //
GE07hv_conau:231: dhruvaṃ ca kīrtimantaṃ cāpy $ ayasmantam ayaspatim &
GE07hv_conau:234: tapas tepe mahārāja % prārthayan sumahad yaśaḥ // HV_2.10 //
GE07hv_conau:235: tasmai brahmā dadau prītaḥ $ sthānam ātmasamaṃ prabhuḥ &
GE07hv_conau:236: acalam caiva purataḥ % saptarṣīṇāṃ prajāpatiḥ // HV_2.11 //
GE07hv_conau:237: tasyābhimānam ṛddhiṃ ca $ mahimānaṃ nirīkṣya ca &
GE07hv_conau:238: devāsurāṇām ācāryaḥ % ślokam apy uśanā jagau // HV_2.12 //
GE07hv_conau:239: aho yasya tapaso vīryam $ aho śrutam aho vratam &
GE07hv_conau:240: yam adya purataḥ kṛtvā % dhruvaṃ saptarṣayaḥ sthitāḥ // HV_2.13 //
GE07hv_conau:241: tasmāc chliṣṭaṃ ca mānyaṃ ca $ dhruvāc chambur vyajāyata &
GE07hv_conau:242: śliṣṭer ādhatta succhāyā % pañca putrān akalmaṣān \
GE07hv_conau:248: ripuṃ ripuṃjayaṃ jajñe $ varāṅgī sā divaṃjayāt |
GE07hv_conau:249: ripuṃ ripuṃjayaṃ vipraṃ vṛkalam vṛkatejasam // HV_2.14 //
GE07hv_conau:251: ajījanat puṣkariṇyāṃ % vairaṇyāṃ cākṣuṣo manum // HV_2.15 //
GE07hv_conau:255: ūruḥ pūruḥ śatadyumnas $ tapasvī satyavit kaviḥ &
GE07hv_conau:256: agniṣṭud atirātraś ca % sudyumnaś ceti tenava \
GE07hv_conau:257: abhimanyuś ca daśamo naḍvalāyāṃ mahaujasaḥ // HV_2.17 //
GE07hv_conau:259: aṅgaṃ sumanasaṃ svātiṃ % kratum āṅgirasaṃ śivam // HV_2.18 //
GE07hv_conau:260: aṅgāt sunīthāpatyaṃ vai $ venam ekaṃ vyajāyata &
GE07hv_conau:261: apacāreṇa venasya % prakopaḥ sumahān abhūt // HV_2.19 //
GE07hv_conau:263: venasya pāṇau mathite % saṃbabhūva mahān ṛṣiḥ // HV_2.20 //
GE07hv_conau:264: taṃ dṛṣṭvā munayaḥ prāhur $ eṣa vai muditāḥ prajāḥ &
GE07hv_conau:265: kariṣyati mahātejā % yaśaś ca prāpsyate mahat // HV_2.21 //
GE07hv_conau:266: sa dhanvī kavacī jātas $ tejasā nirdahann iva &
GE07hv_conau:267: [k: D6 T1.2 G ins. after the repetition of 22a; T4 after 22a: :k]
GE07hv_conau:270: pṛthur vainyas tadā cemāṃ % rarakṣa kṣatrapūrvajaḥ // HV_2.22 //
GE07hv_conau:272: tasmāc caiva samutpannau % nipuṇau sūtam agadhau // HV_2.23 //
GE07hv_conau:273: teneyaṃ gaur mahārāja $ dugdhā sasyāni bhārata &
GE07hv_conau:274: prajānāṃ vṛttikāmena % devaiḥ sarṣigaṇaiḥ saha // HV_2.24 //
GE07hv_conau:275: sarpaiḥ puṇyajanaiś caiva $ vīrudbhiḥ parvatais tathā // HV_2.25 //
GE07hv_conau:276: teṣu teṣu ca pātreṣu $ duhyamānā vasuṃdharā &
GE07hv_conau:277: prādād yathepsitaṃ kṣīraṃ % tena prāṇān adhāryan // HV_2.26 //
GE07hv_conau:281: prācīnabarhiṣaṃ śukram % gayaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ vrajājinau // HV_2.28 //
GE07hv_conau:283: havirdhānān mahārāja % yena saṃvardhitāḥ prajāḥ // HV_2.29 //
GE07hv_conau:287: mahatas tapasaḥ pāre % savarṇāyāṃ mahīpatiḥ // HV_2.31 //
GE07hv_conau:291: sarve pracetasa nāma % dhanurvedasya pāragāḥ // HV_2.32 //
GE07hv_conau:296: [k: After 34, Ñ2 V B2 Ds D3-5 ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conau:298: nāśakan māruto vātuṃ $ vṛtaṃ kham abhavad drumaiḥ &
GE07hv_conau:299: daśa varṣasahasrāṇi % na śekuś ceṣṭituṃ prajāḥ // HV_2.35 //
GE07hv_conau:300: tad upaśrutya tapasā $ yuktāḥ sarve pracetasaḥ &
GE07hv_conau:303: mukhebhyo vāyum agniṃ ca % te 'sṛjañ jātamanyavaḥ // HV_2.36 //
GE07hv_conau:304: unmūlān atha vṛkṣāṃs tān $ kṛtvā vāyur aśoṣayat &
GE07hv_conau:305: tān agnir adahad ghora % evam āsīd drumakṣayaḥ // HV_2.37 //
GE07hv_conau:306: drumakṣayam atho buddhvā $ kiṃcic chiṣṭeṣu śākhiṣu &
GE07hv_conau:307: upagamyābravīd etān % rājā somaḥ pratāpavān // HV_2.38 //
GE07hv_conau:309: vṛkṣaśūnyā kṛtā pṛthvī % śāmyetām agnimārutau // HV_2.39 //
GE07hv_conau:311: bhaviṣyaṃ jānatā tāta % dhṛtā garbheṇa vai mayā // HV_2.40 //
GE07hv_conau:312: māriṣā nāma nāmnaiṣā $ vṛkṣāṇām iti nirmitā &
GE07hv_conau:314: [k: "mahābhāgā" could be attribute of Māriṣā (without visarga) or of the Pracetasaḥ (with visarga). :k]
GE07hv_conau:316: asyām utpatsyate vidvān % dakṣo nāma prajāpatiḥ // HV_2.42 //
GE07hv_conau:319: tataḥ somasya vacanāj $ jagṛhus te pracetasaḥ &
GE07hv_conau:320: saṃhṛtya kopaṃ vṛkṣebhyaḥ % patnīṃ dharmeṇa māriṣām // HV_2.44 //
GE07hv_conau:321: [k: After 44, N (except Ś1 Ñ2 D6) T4 G2 ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conau:322: māriṣāyāṃ tatas te vai $ manasā garbham ādadhuḥ |
GE07hv_conau:324: dakṣo jajñe mahātejāḥ % somasyāṃśena bhārata // HV_2.45 //
GE07hv_conau:326: acarāṃś ca carāṃś caiva % dvipado 'tha catuṣpadaḥ // HV_2.46 //
GE07hv_conau:327: sa sṛṣṭvā manasā dakṣaḥ $ palścād asṛjata striyaḥ &
GE07hv_conau:330: dadau sa daśa darmāya % kaśyapāya trayodaśa \
GE07hv_conau:331: śiṣṭāḥ somāya rājñe tu nakṣatrākhyā dadau prabhuḥ // HV_2.47 //
GE07hv_conau:332: tāsu devā khagā gāvo $ nāgā ditijadānavāḥ &
GE07hv_conau:333: gandharvāpsarasaś caiva % jajñire 'nyāś ca jātayaḥ // HV_2.48 //
GE07hv_conau:335: saṃkalpād darśanāt sparśāt % pūrveṣāṃ sṛṣṭir ucyate // HV_2.49 //
GE07hv_conau:338: saṃbhavaḥ kathitaḥ pūrvaṃ % dakṣasya ca mahātmanaḥ // HV_2.50 //
GE07hv_conau:339: aṅguṣṭhād brahmaṇo jāto $ dakṣaś coktas tvayānagha &
GE07hv_conau:340: [k: After 51ab, N (except Ś1 Ñ1) T2.4 G M4 ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conau:341: vāmāṅguṣṭhāt tathā caiva $ tasya patnī vyajāyata |
GE07hv_conau:342: kathaṃ prācetasatvaṃ sa % punar lebhe mahātapāḥ // HV_2.51 //

GE07hv_conau:5246: nārasiṃhena vapuṣā % pāṇiṃ saṃspṛśya pāṇinā // HV_31.65 //

GE07hv_conau:5365: rūpiṇī yasya pārśvasthā $ sīteti prathitā janaiḥ &

GE07hv_conau:5377: yatrāvadhyaṃ rākṣasendraṃ % rāvaṇaṃ yudhi durjayam // HV_31.122 //

GE07hv_conau:5387: rāvaṇaṃ nijaghānāśu % rāmo bhūtapatiḥ purā // HV_31.126 //

GE07hv_conau:5391: etāni kṛtvā karmāṇi $ rāmo dharmabhṛtāṃ varaḥ &
GE07hv_conau:5394: na vittaharaṇaṃ cāsīd % rāme rājyaṃ praśāsati // HV_31.129 //
GE07hv_conau:5395: paryadevan na vidhavā $ nānarthaś cābhavat tadā &
GE07hv_conau:5396: sarvam āsīj jagaddāntaṃ % rāme rājyaṃ praśāsati // HV_31.130 //
GE07hv_conau:5398: na ca sma vṛddhā bālānāṃ % pretakāryāṇi kurvate // HV_31.131 //
GE07hv_conau:5399: brahma paryaccarat kṣatraṃ $ viśaḥ kṣatram anuvratāḥ &
GE07hv_conau:5400: śūdrāś caiva hi varṇāṃs trīñ % śuśrūṣanty anahaṃkṛtāḥ // HV_31.132 //
GE07hv_conau:5401: nāryo nātyacaran bhartṝn $ bhāryāṃ nātyacarat patiḥ &
GE07hv_conau:5402: sarvam āsīj jagaddāntaṃ % nirdasyur abhavan mahī \
GE07hv_conau:5403: rāma eko 'bhavad bhartā rāmaḥ pālayitābhavat // HV_31.133 //
GE07hv_conau:5405: arogāḥ prāṇinaś cāsan % rāme rājyaṃ praśāsati // HV_31.134 //
GE07hv_conau:5406: devatānām ṛṣīṇāṃ ca $ manuṣyāṇāṃ ca sarvaśaḥ &

GE07hv_conau:5409: rāmo rāmo rāma iti $ prajānām abhavat kathāḥ |
GE07hv_conau:5411: gāthā apy atra gāyanti $ ye purāṇavido janāḥ &
GE07hv_conau:5412: rāme nibaddhās tattvārthā % māhātmyaṃ tasya dhīmataḥ // HV_31.136 //
GE07hv_conau:5416: ayodhyādhipatir bhūtvā % rāmo rājyam akārayat // HV_31.138 //
GE07hv_conau:5418: avyucchinno 'bhavad rāṣṭre % dīyatāṃ bhujyatām iti // HV_31.139 //

GE07hv_conau:5427: yatra sālvaṃ ca kaṃsaṃ ca $ maindaṃ dvividam eva ca &

GE07hv_conau:5445: [k: N (except Ś1 Ñ1) T1.3.4 G3.5 ins. after 148c: :k]
GE07hv_conau:5448: [k: After 148, N(except Ś1 Ñ1) T3.4 G3-5 ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conau:5450: kṣapayitvā ca tān sarvān $ bhāvinārthena coditān |
GE07hv_conau:5452: tataḥ kāle vyatīte tu $ sāmātye sahasainike |
GE07hv_conau:5453: nṛpeṣv atha pranaṣteṣu $ tadā tv apragrahāḥ prajāḥ ||
GE07hv_conau:5454: kṣaṇena nirvṛte caiva $ hatvā cānyonyam āhave |
GE07hv_conau:5457: prajāḥ kṣayaṃ prayāsyanti $ sārdhaṃ kaliyugena ha |
GE07hv_conau:5458: kṣīṇe kaliyuge tasmiṃs $ tataḥ kṛtayugaṃ punaḥ |
GE07hv_conau:5460: [k: After line 1 of *482, Ñ2.3 V1.3 ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conau:5463: niḥśeṣāñ śuddharājāṃs tāṃs $ tadā sa tu kariṣyati |
GE07hv_conau:5464: pāṣaṇḍān mlecchajātīṃś ca $ dasyūṃś caiva sahasraśaḥ |
GE07hv_conau:5465: nātyarthaṃ dhārmikā ye ca $ ye ca dharmadviṣaḥ kvacit |
GE07hv_conau:5468: tathaiva dākṣiṇātyāṃś ca $ draviḍān siṃhalaiḥ saha |
GE07hv_conau:5469: gāndhārān pāradāṃś caiva $ pahlavān yavanāñ śakān |
GE07hv_conau:5470: tukhārān barbarāṃś caiva $ śvānikān daradān khaśān |
GE07hv_conau:5471: lambakāṃś ca maruṃdhāṃś ca $ kirātāṃś caiva sa prabhuḥ |
GE07hv_conau:5474: mānuṣaḥ sa tu saṃjajñe $ devasyāgrasya dhīmataḥ |
GE07hv_conau:5475: pūrvajanmani viṣṇuḥ sa $ pramatir nāma vīryavān |
GE07hv_conau:5477: ity etā vāsudevasya $ daśa saṃbhūtayaḥ smṛtāḥ |
GE07hv_conau:5478: taṃ taṃ kālaṃ ca kāryaṃ ca $ taṃ tathoddeśakāriṇam |
GE07hv_conau:5479: aṃśena triṣu lokeṣu $ tāṃs tān yonīn viśaty api |
GE07hv_conau:5482: kṛtvā bījāvaśeṣāṃ tu $ mahīṃ krūreṇa karmaṇā |
GE07hv_conau:5483: saṃyodhayitvā ca khalān $ prāyas tān apy adhārmikān |
GE07hv_conau:5484: tad eṣa vai tadā kalkī $ caritārthaḥ sasainikaḥ |
GE07hv_conau:5485: prajānāṃ sādhayitvā ca $ saṃsiddhārthaḥ punaḥ svayam |
GE07hv_conau:5487: [k: After line 7 of *482 Ñ2 V1.3 ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conau:5488: purāṇi hatvā grāmāṃś ca $ tadā duṣpragrahāḥ prajāḥ |
GE07hv_conau:5490: hvasvā alpāyuṣaś caiva $ bhaviṣyanti kalau yuge |
GE07hv_conau:5494: ete cānye ca bahavo $ divyā devaguṇair yutāḥ &
GE07hv_conau:5501: viṣṇor amitavīryasya % yaḥ śṛṇoti kṛtāñjaliḥ // HV_31.152 //
GE07hv_conau:5505: nāśubhaṃ vidyate tasya $ putravān dyutimān bhavet |
GE07hv_conau:5506: etās tu yogeśvarayogamāyāḥ $ śrutvā naro mucyati sarvapāpaiḥ &
GE07hv_conau:5507: ṛddhiṃ samṛddhiṃ vipulāṃś ca bhogān % prāpnoti śīghraṃ bhagavatprasādāt //
GE07hv_conau:5509: [h: HV (CE) chapter 32, transliterated by Atul Agarwala, proof-read by Horst Brinkhaus, version of February 24, 2000 :h]
GE07hv_conau:5511: viśvatvaṃ śṛṇu me viṣṇor $ haritvaṃ ca kṛte yuge &
GE07hv_conau:5512: vaikuṇṭhatvaṃ ca deveṣu % kṛṣṇatvaṃ mānuṣeṣu ca // HV_32.1 //
GE07hv_conau:5513: īśvarasya hi tasyemāṃ $ karmaṇāṃ gahanāṃ gatim &
GE07hv_conau:5514: saṃpratyatītāṃ bhāvyāṃ ca % śṛṇu rājan yathātatham // HV_32.2 //
GE07hv_conau:5515: avyakto vyaktaliṅgastho $ ya eṣa bhagavān prabhuḥ &
GE07hv_conau:5516: nārāyaṇo hy anantātmā % prabhavo 'vyaya eva ca // HV_32.3 //
GE07hv_conau:5517: eṣa nārāyaṇo bhūtvā $ harir āsīt sanātanaḥ &
GE07hv_conau:5518: brahmā śakraś ca somaś ca % dharmaḥ śukro bṛhaspatiḥ // HV_32.4 //
GE07hv_conau:5520: eṣa viṣṇur iti khyāta % indrād avarajo 'bhavat // HV_32.5 //
GE07hv_conau:5521: prasādajaṃ hy asya vibhor $ adityāṃ putrajanma tat &
GE07hv_conau:5523: pradhānātmā purā hy eṣa $ brahmāṇam asṛjat prabhuḥ &
GE07hv_conau:5525: te tanvānās tanūs tatra $ brahmavaṃśān anuttamān &
GE07hv_conau:5526: tebhyo 'bhavan mahātmabhyo % bahudhā brahma śāśvatam // HV_32.8 //
GE07hv_conau:5528: kīrtitaṃ kīrtanīyasya % kīrtyamānaṃ nibodha me // HV_32.9 //
GE07hv_conau:5529: vṛtte vṛtravadhe tāta $ vartamāne kṛte yuge &
GE07hv_conau:5531: tatra sma dānavā ghorāḥ $ sarve saṃgrāmadarpitāḥ &
GE07hv_conau:5534: trātāraṃ manasā jagmur % devaṃ nārāyaṇaṃ prabhum // HV_32.12 //
GE07hv_conau:5540: rarāsa ghorair utpātair % dahyamānam ivāmbaram // HV_32.15 //
GE07hv_conau:5542: nyubjāni ca vimānāni % prapatanty utpatanti ca // HV_32.16 //
GE07hv_conau:5545: tamasā niṣprabhaṃ sarvaṃ $ na prājñāyata kiṃcana &
GE07hv_conau:5546: timiraughaparikṣiptā % na rejuś ca diṣo daśa // HV_32.18 //
GE07hv_conau:5548: dyaur na bhāty abhibhūtārkā % ghoreṇa tamasā vṛtā // HV_32.19 //
GE07hv_conau:5549: tān ghanaughān satimirān $ dorbhyāṃ vikṣipya sa prabhuḥ &
GE07hv_conau:5550: vapuḥ saṃdarśayām āsa % divyaṃ kṛṣṇavapur hariḥ // HV_32.20 //
GE07hv_conau:5552: tejasā vapuṣā caiva % kṛṣṇaṃ kṛṣṇam ivācalam // HV_32.21 //
GE07hv_conau:5566: dadṛśus te sthitaṃ devaṃ % divyalokamaye rathe // HV_32.28 //
GE07hv_conau:5568: jayaśabdaṃ puraskṛtya % śaraṇyaṃ śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ // HV_32.29 //
GE07hv_conau:5570: tuṣṭuvuś ca jagannāthaṃ $ devaṃ nārāyaṇaṃ harim |
GE07hv_conau:5571: jaya deva jagannātha $ jaya deva janārdana |
GE07hv_conau:5572: jaya deva prabho viṣṇo $ jaya śaṅkhagadādhara |
GE07hv_conau:5573: namas tubhyaṃ hṛṣīkeśa $ namo deva janārdana |
GE07hv_conau:5575: namas tubhyaṃ prabho viṣṇo $ bhūtādipataye namaḥ |
GE07hv_conau:5576: nama ādyāya bījāya $ puruṣāya namo namaḥ |
GE07hv_conau:5577: namo 'stu te jagannātha $ namo bhūyo mahātmane |
GE07hv_conau:5580: sa teṣāṃ tāṃ giraṃ śrutvā $ viṣṇur dayitadaivataḥ &
GE07hv_conau:5581: manaś cakre vināśāya % dānavānāṃ mahāmṛdhe // HV_32.30 //
GE07hv_conau:5582: ākāśe tu sthito viṣṇur $ uttamaṃ vapur āsthitaḥ &
GE07hv_conau:5583: uvāca devatāḥ sarvāḥ % sapratijñam idaṃ vacaḥ // HV_32.31 //
GE07hv_conau:5584: śāntiṃ vrajata bhadraṃ vo $ mā bhaiṣṭa marutāṃ gaṇāḥ &
GE07hv_conau:5585: jitā me dānavāḥ sarve % trailokyaṃ pratigṛhyatām // HV_32.32 //
GE07hv_conau:5586: te tasya satyasaṃdhasya $ viṣṇor vākyena toṣitāḥ &
GE07hv_conau:5587: devāḥ prītiṃ parāṃ jagmuḥ % prāpyevāmṛtam uttamam // HV_32.33 //
GE07hv_conau:5588: tatas tamaḥ saṃhriyate $ vineśuś ca balāhakāḥ &
GE07hv_conau:5589: pravavuś ca śivā vātāḥ % prasannāś ca diśo daśa // HV_32.34 //
GE07hv_conau:5590: suprabhāṇi ca jyotiṃṣi $ candraṃ cakruḥ pradakṣiṇam &
GE07hv_conau:5591: dīptimanti ca tejāṃsi % cakrur arkaṃ pradakṣiṇam // HV_32.35 //
GE07hv_conau:5592: na vigrahaṃ grahāś cakruḥ $ praseduś cāpi sindhavaḥ &
GE07hv_conau:5593: virajaskā babhur mārgā % nākamārgādayas trayaḥ // HV_32.36 //
GE07hv_conau:5597: yajñeṣu ca haviḥ svādu % śivam āpa ca pāvakaḥ // HV_32.38 //
GE07hv_conau:5608: giraṃ te dānavān ugrān $ menire nihatān yudhi |
GE07hv_conau:5610: [h: HV (CE) chapter 33, transliterated by Atul Agarwala, proof-read by Horst Brinkhaus, version of February 24, 2000 :h]
GE07hv_conau:5613: udyogaṃ vipulaṃ cakrur % yuddhāya yudhi durjayāḥ // HV_33.1 //
GE07hv_conau:5617: racitaṃ ratnajālaiś ca % hemajālaiś ca śobhitam // HV_33.3 //
GE07hv_conau:5627: atiṣṭhat samarākāṅkṣī % meruṃ dīpta ivāṃśumān // HV_33.8 //
GE07hv_conau:5628: tāras tu kroṣavistāram $ āyasaṃ vāhayan ratham &
GE07hv_conau:5633: āyasaiḥ parighaiḥ pūrṇaṃ % kṣepaṇīyaiś ca mudgaraiḥ // HV_33.11 //
GE07hv_conau:5634: prāsaiḥ pāśaiś ca vitatair $ avasaktaiś ca mudgaraiḥ &
GE07hv_conau:5635: śobhitaṃ trāsanīyaiś ca % tomaraiḥ saparaśvadhaiḥ // HV_33.12 //
GE07hv_conau:5636: udyataṃ dviṣatāṃ hetor $ dvitīyam iva mandaram &
GE07hv_conau:5639: pramukhe tasya sainyasya % dīptaśṛṅga ivācalaḥ // HV_33.14 //
GE07hv_conau:5643: varāhaḥ pramukhe tasthau % sāvaroha ivācalaḥ // HV_33.16 //
GE07hv_conau:5644: kṣaras tu vikṣaran darpān $ netrābhyāṃ roṣajaṃ jalam &
GE07hv_conau:5646: tvaṣṭā tv aṣṭādaśahayaṃ $ yānam āsthāya dānavaḥ &
GE07hv_conau:5647: vyūhito dānavair vyūhaiḥ % paricakrāma vīryavān // HV_33.18 //

GE07hv_conau:6161: te gadābhiś ca gurvībhiś $ cakraiś ca saparaśvaghaiḥ &

GE07hv_conau:6185: tayoś camvos tadānīṃ tu $ babhūva sa samāgamaḥ &

GE07hv_conau:6189: niścakramur balābhyāṃ tu $ tābhyāṃ bhīmāḥ surāsurāḥ &

GE07hv_conau:6196: duṃdubhīnāṃ ca ninadā % daityam antardadhuḥ svanam // HV_37.25 //

GE07hv_conau:6202: paripetur bhṛśaṃ kecin % nyubjāḥ kecic ca jajñire // HV_37.28 //

GE07hv_conau:6245: adyaprabhṛti devendro $ na tvaṃ bhavasi vṛtrahan |

GE07hv_conau:6266: airāvatagataḥ saṃkhye % calituṃ na śaśāka ha // HV_37.47 //
GE07hv_conau:6268: nirvyāpāraḥ kṛtas tena % vipāśo varuṇo mṛdhe // HV_37.48 //
GE07hv_conau:6271: jaghāna devarājam ca $ somaṃ varuṇam aśvinau |

GE07hv_conau:6283: taṃ dṛṣṭvā vismitāḥ sarve $ lokapālā mahaujasaḥ |
GE07hv_conau:6285: vajreṇa nihato daityo $ na cakampe girir yathā |
GE07hv_conau:6286: punar vajreṇa taṃ daityam $ indro mārutavartmani |
GE07hv_conau:6287: sthitas tadā jṛmbhaṇena $ jigīrṇe sāyudhaṃ hariḥ |
GE07hv_conau:6289: tatkṣaṇād eva devendraḥ $ pārśvaṃ nirbhidya niryayau ||
GE07hv_conau:6291: tataḥ śūlam amoghaṃ tu $ śaṃkaro hantum ādade |
GE07hv_conau:6293: na śūlena na cānyena $ hantuṃ śakyo mahāsuraḥ |
GE07hv_conau:6294: śūlaṃ etad amoghaṃ ca $ mā prayuñkṣva mahāsure || *HV_37.48*518:25 |
GE07hv_conau:6295: ity uktaḥ śūlapāṇiḥ sa $ saṃjahārāyudhaṃ svakam |
GE07hv_conau:6297: ūcuḥ kṛṣṇaṃ mahātmāno $ gīrbhiḥ stutvā janārdanam |
GE07hv_conau:6303: tadaiva lokapālāś ca $ nihatās tena saṃyugam |
GE07hv_conau:6305: yāmyām avasthām amaro % nītaḥ svāṃ diśam āviśat // HV_37.50 //
GE07hv_conau:6307: lokapālās tu te sarve $ mānuṣīṃ tanum āsthitāḥ |
GE07hv_conau:6308: vihāya svapadaṃ rājan $ vivadanti sma mānuṣe |
GE07hv_conau:6309: sa lokapālān utsādya $ hṛtvā teṣāṃ ca karma tat &
GE07hv_conau:6310: dikṣu sarvāsu dehaṃ svaṃ % caturdhā vidadhe tadā // HV_37.51 //
GE07hv_conau:6312: jahāra lakṣmīṃ somasya % taṃ cāsya viṣayaṃ mahat // HV_37.52 //
GE07hv_conau:6314: sāyanaṃ cāsya viṣayaṃ % jahāra dinakarma ca // HV_37.53 //
GE07hv_conau:6316: vāyuṃ ca tarasā jitvā % cakārātmavaśānugam // HV_37.54 //
GE07hv_conau:6317: sa samudrān samānīya $ sarvāś ca sarito balāt &
GE07hv_conau:6318: cakārātmavaśe vīryād % dehabhūtāś ca sindhavaḥ // HV_37.55 //
GE07hv_conau:6319: āpaḥ sa vaśagāḥ kṛtvā $ divijātāś ca bhūmijāḥ &
GE07hv_conau:6320: sthāpayām āsa jagatīṃ % suguptāṃ dharaṇīdharaiḥ // HV_37.56 //
GE07hv_conau:6326: taṃ tuṣṭuvur daityagaṇā % devā iva pitāmaham // HV_37.59 //
GE07hv_conau:6328: [h: HV (CE) chapter 38, transliterated by Atul Agarwala, proof-read by Horst Brinkhaus, version of March 2, 2000 :h]
GE07hv_conau:6331: vedo dharmaḥ kṣamā satyaṃ % śrīś ca nārāyaṇāśrayā // HV_38.1 //

GE07hv_conau:6342: ayaṃ sa vigraho 'smākam $ aśāmyaḥ kila kathyate &

GE07hv_conau:6346: ayaṃ sa viṣṇur devānāṃ $ vaikuṇṭhaś ca divaukasām &

GE07hv_conau:6348: ayaṃ sa nātho devānām $ asmābhir viprakṛṣyatām &

GE07hv_conau:6350: asya cchāyāṃ samāśritya $ devā makhamukhe sthitāḥ &

GE07hv_conau:6352: ayaṃ sa nidhane hetuḥ $ sarveṣāṃ daitavadviṣām &

GE07hv_conau:6354: ayaṃ sa kila yuddheṣu $ surārthe tyaktajīvitaḥ &

GE07hv_conau:6356: ayaṃ sa kālo daityānāṃ $ kālabhūte mayi sthite &
GE07hv_conau:6357: atikrāntasya kālasya % phalaṃ prāpsyati durmatiḥ // HV_38.14 //
GE07hv_conau:6358: diṣṭyedānīṃ samakṣaṃ me $ viṣṇur eṣa samāgataḥ &

GE07hv_conau:6360: yāsyāmy apacitiṃ diṣṭyā $ pūrveṣām adya saṃyuge &

GE07hv_conau:6362: kṣipram eva vadhiṣyāmi $ raṇe nārāyaṇaṃ śairaiḥ &

GE07hv_conau:6364: eṣo 'ntakaḥ purā bhūtvā $ padmanābha iti smṛtaḥ &

GE07hv_conau:6369: pitaraṃ me jaghānaiko % hiraṇyakaśipuṃ purā // HV_38.19 //

GE07hv_conau:6664: annajā bhuvi martyānāṃ $ śramajā vā kathaṃcana &

GE07hv_conau:6666: svapnānte kṣīyate hy eṣā $ prāyaśo bhuvi dehinām &

GE07hv_conau:6668: deveṣv api dadhāraināṃ $ nānyo nārāyaṇād ṛte &

GE07hv_conau:6674: sa tayā nidrayā channas $ tasmin nārāyaṇāśrame &
GE07hv_conau:6675: śete sma hi tadā viṣṇur % mohayañ jagad avyayaḥ // HV_40.34 //
GE07hv_conau:6677: jagmuḥ kṛtayugaṃ caiva % tretā caiva yugottamam // HV_40.35 //
GE07hv_conau:6678: sa tu dvāparaparyante $ dṛṣṭvā lokān suduḥkhitān &
GE07hv_conau:6681: jahīhi nidrāṃ sahajāṃ $ bhuktapūrvām iva srajam &
GE07hv_conau:6682: ime te brahmaṇā sārdhaṃ % devā darśanakāṅkṣiṇaḥ // HV_40.37 //
GE07hv_conau:6686: śṛṇu viṣṇo śubhāṃ vācaṃ % bhūvyomāgnyanilāmbhasām // HV_40.39 //
GE07hv_conau:6687: ime tvā sapta munayaḥ $ sahitā munimaṇḍalaiḥ &
GE07hv_conau:6688: stuvanti deva divyābhir % geyābhir gīrbhir añjasā // HV_40.40 //
GE07hv_conau:6690: kāraṇaṃ kiṃcid utpannaṃ % devānāṃ kāryagauravāt // HV_40.41 //
GE07hv_conau:6693: tvayi supte jagat suptaṃ $ tvayi jāgrati jāgṛtam || *HV_40.41*537:2 |

GE07hv_conau:6700: sa dadarśa surān sarvān $ sametān sapitāmahān &
GE07hv_conau:6704: kuto vo vigraho devāḥ $ kuto vo bhayam āgatam &

GE07hv_conau:6706: na khalv akuśalaṃ loke $ vartate dānavotthitam &

GE07hv_conau:6711: [h: HV (CE) chapter 41, transliterated by Horst Brinkhaus, proof-read by Horst Brinkhaus, version of September 12, 2002 :h]
GE07hv_conau:6714: uvāca paramaṃ vākyaṃ % hitaṃ sarvadivaukasām // HV_41.1 //
GE07hv_conau:6715: nāsti kiṃcid bhayaṃ viṣṇo $ surāṇām asurāntaka &

GE07hv_conau:6718: dharme prayatamānānāṃ % mānavānāṃ kuto bhayam // HV_41.3 //
GE07hv_conau:6719: satye dharme ca niratā $ mānavā vigatajvarāḥ &
GE07hv_conau:6721: mānavānāṃ ca patayaḥ $ pārthivāś ca parasparam &
GE07hv_conau:6722: ṣaḍbhāgam upayuñjānā % na bhedaṃ kurvate mithaḥ // HV_41.5 //
GE07hv_conau:6724: akarair viprayuktārthāḥ % kośam āpūrayan sadā // HV_41.6 //
GE07hv_conau:6726: atīkṣṇad aṇḍāś caturo % varṇāñ jugupur añjasā // HV_41.7 //
GE07hv_conau:6730: yajanti ca yathākālaṃ % yajñair vipuladakṣiṇaiḥ // HV_41.9 //
GE07hv_conau:6732: śrāddhaiś ca medhyaiḥ śataśas % tarpayanti pitāmahān // HV_41.10 //
GE07hv_conau:6733: naiṣām aviditaṃ kiṃcit $ trividhaṃ bhuvi vidyate &
GE07hv_conau:6734: vaidikaṃ laukikaṃ caiva % dharmaśāstroktam eva ca // HV_41.11 //
GE07hv_conau:6736: bhūyaḥ kṛtayugaṃ kartum % utsahante narādhipāḥ // HV_41.12 //
GE07hv_conau:6737: teṣām eva prabhāvena $ śivaṃ varṣati vāsavaḥ &
GE07hv_conau:6738: yathārthaṃ ca vavur vātā % virajaskā diśo daśa // HV_41.13 //
GE07hv_conau:6742: nirutpātā ca vasudhā $ supracārāś ca vai grahāḥ &
GE07hv_conau:6743: candramāś ca sanakṣatraḥ % saumyaṃ carati yogataḥ // HV_41.14 //
GE07hv_conau:6744: anulomakaraḥ sūryo $ ayane dve cacāra ha &
GE07hv_conau:6745: havyaiś ca vividhais tṛptaḥ % śubhagandho hutāśanaḥ // HV_41.15 //
GE07hv_conau:6747: tarpayatsu mahīṃ kṛtsnāṃ % nṛṇāṃ kālabhayaṃ kutaḥ // HV_41.16 //
GE07hv_conau:6749: rājñāṃ balair balavatāṃ % pīḍyate vasudhātalam // HV_41.17 //
GE07hv_conau:6751: pṛthivī samanuprāptā % naur ivāsann aviplavā // HV_41.18 //
GE07hv_conau:6753: jalotpīḍākulā svedaṃ % darśayantī muhur muhuḥ // HV_41.19 //
GE07hv_conau:6754: kṣatriyāṇāṃ vapurbhiś ca $ tejasā ca balena ca &
GE07hv_conau:6755: nṛṇāṃ ca rāṣṭrair vistīrṇaiḥ % śrāmyatīva vasuṃdharā // HV_41.20 //
GE07hv_conau:6758: tac chṛṇuṣva mahābāho $ rahasyam idam uttamam |
GE07hv_conau:6759: pure pure narapatiḥ $ koṭisaṃkhyair balair vṛtaḥ &
GE07hv_conau:6760: rāṣṭre rāṣṭre ca bahavo % grāmāḥ śatasahasraśaḥ // HV_41.21 //
GE07hv_conau:6761: bhūmipānāṃ sahasraiś ca $ teṣāṃ ca balināṃ balaiḥ &
GE07hv_conau:6762: grāmāyutāḍhyai rāṣṭraiś ca % bhūmir nirvivarīkṛtā // HV_41.22 //
GE07hv_conau:6763: seyaṃ nirāmiṣaṃ kṛtvā $ niśceṣṭaṃ kālam agrataḥ &

GE07hv_conau:6765: karmabhūmir ihasthānāṃ $ bhūmir eṣā vyathāṃ gatā &

GE07hv_conau:6767: asyā hi pīḍane doṣo $ mahān syān madhusūdana &
GE07hv_conau:6768: kriyālopaś ca lokānāṃ % dūṣitaṃ ca jagad bhavet // HV_41.25 //
GE07hv_conau:6770: sahajāṃ yā kṣamāṃ tyaktvā % calatvam acalā gatā // HV_41.26 //
GE07hv_conau:6771: tad asyāḥ śrutavantaḥ sma $ tac cāpi bhavatā śrutam &
GE07hv_conau:6772: bhārāvataraṇārthaṃ hi % mantrayāmas tvayā saha // HV_41.27 //
GE07hv_conau:6773: satpathe hi sthitāḥ sarve $ rājāno rāṣṭravardhanāḥ &
GE07hv_conau:6774: narāṇāṃ ca trayo varṇā % brāhmaṇān anuyāyinaḥ // HV_41.28 //
GE07hv_conau:6775: sarvaṃ satyamayaṃ vākyaṃ $ varṇā dharmaparās tathā &

GE07hv_conau:6778: yathā dharmavadho na syāt % tathā mantraḥ pravartatām // HV_41.30 //
GE07hv_conau:6779: satāṃ gatir iyaṃ nānyā $ dharmaś cāsyāḥ susādhanam &

GE07hv_conau:6787: [h: HV (CE) chapter 42, transliterated by Horst Brinkhaus, proof-read by Horst Brinkhaus, version of July 30, 2001 :h]

GE07hv_conau:6811: yathānideśaṃ tridaśā % viviśus te sabhāṃ śubhām // HV_42.10 //

GE07hv_conau:6832: tāvan me 'sti bhayaṃ bhūyo $ yāvan na tvāṃ kakudminam |

GE07hv_conau:6854: dṛṣṭvā tāv asurau ghorau $ mahāntau yuddhadurmadau &

GE07hv_conau:6860: tad abhūt tumulaṃ yuddhaṃ $ varṣasaṃkhyāḥ sahasraśaḥ &

GE07hv_conau:6862: atha dīrghasya kālasya $ tau daityau yuddhadurmadau &

GE07hv_conau:6866: hatau ca tava putratvaṃ $ prāpnuyāvaḥ surottama &
GE07hv_conau:6867: so hy āvāṃ yudhi nirjetā % tasyāvāṃ vihitau sutau // HV_42.29 //
GE07hv_conau:6868: sa hi gṛhya mṛdhe daityau $ dorbhyāṃ tau samapīḍayat &

GE07hv_conau:6870: tāv ubhāv āplutau toye $ vapurbhyām ekatāṃ gatau &

GE07hv_conau:6872: medasā tajjalaṃ vyāptaṃ $ tābhyāṃ antardadhe tadā &

GE07hv_conau:6874: daityayor medasā channā $ medinīti tataḥ smṛtā &

GE07hv_conau:6878: hṛtāhaṃ kramatā bhūyas $ tadā yuṣmākam agrataḥ &

GE07hv_conau:6881: anāthā jagato nāthaṃ % śaraṇyaṃ śaraṇaṃ gatā // HV_42.36 //

GE07hv_conau:6897: vidhavā śūnyanagarā % na dhārayitum utsahe // HV_42.44 //
GE07hv_conau:6898: tan mahyaṃ dīyatāṃ bhartā $ bhagavaṃs tvatsamo nṛpaḥ &
GE07hv_conau:6899: rakṣet sagrāmanagarāṃ % yo māṃ sāgaramālinīm // HV_42.45 //
GE07hv_conau:6900: sa śrutvā bhagavān vākyaṃ $ bāḍham ity abravīt prabhuḥ &

GE07hv_conau:6906: bahavaḥ kṣatriyāḥ śūrā $ māṃ jitvā divam āśritāḥ &

GE07hv_conau:6908: matkṛte vigrahā loke $ vṛtte vartanta eva ca &
GE07hv_conau:6911: jagaddhitārthaṃ kuruta % rājñāṃ hetuṃ raṇakṣaye // HV_42.51 //
GE07hv_conau:6913: ekaś cakradharaḥ śrīmān % abhayaṃ me prayacchatu // HV_42.52 //
GE07hv_conau:6915: bhāro yady avaroptavyo % viṣṇur eṣa bravītu mām // HV_42.53 //
GE07hv_conau:6918: mā bhair dharaṇi kalyāṇi $ śāntiṃ vraja samāhite |
GE07hv_conau:6919: eṣa tvām ucitaṃ sthānaṃ $ sthāpayāmi vasiṃdhare |

GE07hv_conau:6926: te śrutvā pṛthivīvākyaṃ $ sarva eva divaukasaḥ &
GE07hv_conau:6929: śarīrakartā lokānāṃ % tvaṃ hi lokasya ceśvaraḥ // HV_43.2 //
GE07hv_conau:6930: yat kartavyaṃ mahendreṇa $ yamena varuṇena ca &
GE07hv_conau:6931: yad vā kāryaṃ dhaneśena % svayaṃ nārāyaṇena vā // HV_43.3 //
GE07hv_conau:6932: yad vā candramasā kāryaṃ $ bhāskareṇānilena vā &
GE07hv_conau:6933: ādityair vasubhir vāpi % rudrair vā lokabhāvanaiḥ // HV_43.4 //
GE07hv_conau:6934: aśvibhyāṃ vā surāgryābhyāṃ $ sādhyair vā tridivālayaiḥ &

GE07hv_conau:6937: bṛhaspatyuśanobhyāṃ vā % kālena kalināpi vā // HV_43.5 //

GE07hv_conau:11502: samājavāṭe parikhāṃ % dehakṛṣṭāṃ cakāra ha // HV_76.36 //

GE07hv_conau:11520: ugrasenasya ca tadā $ vavande śirasā hariḥ |
GE07hv_conau:11522: yādavāṃś caiva tān sarvān $ yathāsthānaṃ yathāvayaḥ &
GE07hv_conau:11523: papraccha kuśalaṃ kṛṣṇo % dīpyamānaḥ svatejasā // HV_76.44 //
GE07hv_conau:11525: bāhubhyām eva tarasā % sunāmānam apothayat // HV_76.45 //
GE07hv_conau:11528: tau jitārī jitakrodhau $ ciraṃ viproṣitau vraje &

GE07hv_conau:11531: te ca devāḥ samunayo $ hate kaṃse durātmani |
GE07hv_conau:11532: namaskṛtya jagannāthaṃ $ svaṃ svaṃ jagmur yathālayam |
GE07hv_conau:11535: hatvā pūtānikāṃ vibhajya śakaṭaṃ bhaṅktvārjunau dānavān |
GE07hv_conau:11537: hatvā keśinam unmadaṃ viṣataruṃ coddhṛtya govardhanaṃ |
GE07hv_conau:11538: yaḥ kaṃsaṃ sagajendramallam avadhīt tasmai namo viṣṇave ||
GE07hv_conau:11541: iti stutvā bahuvidhaṃ $ te devā hṛṣṭamānasāḥ |
GE07hv_conau:11542: [h: HV (CE) chapter 77, transliterated by John Brockington, proof-read by John Brockington, version of 7th November 2001 :h]
GE07hv_conau:11544: bhartāraṃ patitaṃ dṛṣṭvā $ kṣīṇapuṇyam iva graham &
GE07hv_conau:11545: kaṃsapatnyo hataṃ kaṃsaṃ % samantāt paryavārayan // HV_77.1 //
GE07hv_conau:11547: bhāryāḥ sma dṛṣṭvā śocanti % mṛgyo mṛgavadhe yathā // HV_77.2 //
GE07hv_conau:11548: hā hatāḥ sma mahābāho $ hatāṣā hatabāndhavāḥ &
GE07hv_conau:11549: vīraptnyo hate vīre % tvayi vīravratapriye // HV_77.3 //
GE07hv_conau:11550: imām avasthāṃ paśyantyaḥ $ paścimāṃ tava naiṣṭhikīm &
GE07hv_conau:11552: chinnamūlāḥ sma saṃvṛttāḥ $ parityaktāḥ sma śobhanaiḥ &
GE07hv_conau:11553: tvayi pañcatvam āpanne % nāthe 'smākaṃ mahābale // HV_77.5 //
GE07hv_conau:11555: latā iva viceṣṭantyaḥ % śayanīyāni neṣyati // HV_77.6 //
GE07hv_conau:11557: dahaty arko mukhaṃ kāntaṃ % nistoyam iva paṅkajam // HV_77.7 //
GE07hv_conau:11558: imau te śravaṇau śūnyau $ na śobhete vikuṇḍalau &
GE07hv_conau:11560: kva te sa mukuṭo vīra $ sarvaratnavibhūṣitaḥ &
GE07hv_conau:11561: atyantaṃ śiraso lakṣmīṃ % yo dadhāty arkasaprabhaḥ // HV_77.9 //
GE07hv_conau:11563: kathaṃ dīnena kartavyaṃ % tvayi lokāntaraṃ gate // HV_77.10 //
GE07hv_conau:11564: nanu nāma striyaḥ sādhvyaḥ $ priyabhogeṣv avañcitāḥ &
GE07hv_conau:11565: patīnām aparityajyās % tvaṃ tu nas tyajya gacchasi // HV_77.11 //
GE07hv_conau:11569: kālatulyaḥ sapatnānāṃ % tvaṃ kṣipram apanīyase // HV_77.12 //
GE07hv_conau:11570: vayaṃ duḥkheṣv anucitāḥ $ sukheṣv eva tu yojitāḥ &
GE07hv_conau:11571: kathaṃ vatsyāma vidhavā % nātha kārpaṇyam āśritāḥ // HV_77.13 //
GE07hv_conau:11572: strīṇāṃ cāritralubdhānāṃ $ patir ekaḥ parā gatiḥ &
GE07hv_conau:11573: tvaṃ hi naḥ sā gatiś chinnā % kṛtāntena balīyasā // HV_77.14 //
GE07hv_conau:11575: [k: Ñ2 V.12 B Ds (D2 after 12) ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conau:11577: roditavye dhruve magnāḥ % kva gacchāmas tvayā vinā // HV_77.15 //
GE07hv_conau:11578: saha tvayā gataḥ kālas $ tvadaṅke krīḍitaṃ gatam &
GE07hv_conau:11579: kṣaṇena ca vihīnāḥ sma % anityā hi nṛṇāṃ gatiḥ // HV_77.16 //
GE07hv_conau:11580: aho bata vipannāḥ sma $ vipanne tvayi mānada &
GE07hv_conau:11583: tvayi kāmavaśāḥ sarvāḥ % sa nas tyajya kva gacchasi // HV_77.18 //
GE07hv_conau:11584: [k: Ñ3 V2.3 B Dn Ds D4 (V1 after 18ab, D2 after *856) ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conau:11585: asmākaṃ tvam anāthānāṃ $ nātho hy asi suropama |
GE07hv_conau:11587: prativākyaṃ jagannātha % dātum arhasi mānada // HV_77.19 //
GE07hv_conau:11589: gamanaṃ te mahārāja % dāruṇaṃ pratibhāti naḥ // HV_77.20 //
GE07hv_conau:11590: nūnaṃ kāntatarāḥ kānta $ tasmiṃl loke varastriyaḥ &
GE07hv_conau:11591: tatas tvaṃ prasthito vīra % vihāyemaṃ gṛhe janam // HV_77.21 //
GE07hv_conau:11592: kiṃ nu te karuṇaṃ vīra $ bhāryāsv etāsu bhūmipa &
GE07hv_conau:11595: ye parityajya dārān svān % nirapekṣā vrajanti ha // HV_77.23 //
GE07hv_conau:11596: apatitvaṃ striyāḥ śreyo $ na tu śūraḥ striyāḥ patiḥ &
GE07hv_conau:11597: svargastrīṇāṃ priyāḥ śurās % teṣām api ca tāḥ priyāḥ // HV_77.24 //
GE07hv_conau:11598: aho kṣipram adṛśyena $ nayatā tvayā raṇapriyam &
GE07hv_conau:11599: prahṛtaṃ naḥ kṛtāntena % sarvāsām antarātmasu // HV_77.25 //
GE07hv_conau:11600: hatvā jarāsaṃdhabalaṃ $ jitvā yakṣāṃś ca saṃyuge &
GE07hv_conau:11602: jarāsaṃdhabalaṃ jitvā $ hatvā rājñāṃ ca saṃyuge |
GE07hv_conau:11604: jitvā devagaṇaṃ yuddhe $ yakṣān api ca saṃyuge |
GE07hv_conau:11605: kathaṃ mānuṣamātreṇa % hatas tvaṃ jagatīpate // HV_77.26 //
GE07hv_conau:11607: amartyair ajito yuddhe % martyenāsi kathaṃ hataḥ // HV_77.27 //
GE07hv_conau:11611: sāyakair jaladān bhittvā % balād varṣaṃ pravartitam // HV_77.29 //
GE07hv_conau:11613: preṣayāṇā varārhāṇi % ratnāny ācchādanāni ca // HV_77.30 //
GE07hv_conau:11615: kathaṃ prāṇāntikaṃ ghoram % īdṛśaṃ bhayam āgatam // HV_77.31 //
GE07hv_conau:11616: prāptāḥ smo vidhavāśabdaṃ $ tvayi nāthe nipātite &
GE07hv_conau:11617: apramattāḥ pramattāḥ sma % kṛtāntena nirākṛtāḥ // HV_77.32 //
GE07hv_conau:11618: yady evaṃ nātha gantavyaṃ $ yadi vā vismṛtā vayam &
GE07hv_conau:11619: vākyamātreṇa yāsyeti % kartavyo naḥ parigrahaḥ // HV_77.33 //
GE07hv_conau:11620: prasīda nātha bhītāḥ sma $ pādau te yāma mūrdhabhiḥ &
GE07hv_conau:11622: aho vīra kathaṃ śeṣe $ niṣaṇṇas tṛṇapāṃsuṣu &
GE07hv_conau:11623: śayānasya hi te bhūmau % kasmān nodvijate manaḥ // HV_77.35 //
GE07hv_conau:11625: prahṛtaṃ kena sarvāsu % nārīsv evaṃ sudāruṇam // HV_77.36 //
GE07hv_conau:11627: kiṃ vayaṃ sati gantavye % saha bhartrā rudāmahe // HV_77.37 //
GE07hv_conau:11629: kva me vatsaḥ kva me putra % iti rorūyate bhṛśam // HV_77.38 //
GE07hv_conau:11630: sāpaśyat taṃ hataṃ putraṃ $ nipītaṃ śaśinaṃ yathā &
GE07hv_conau:11631: hṛdayena vidīrṇena % śrāmyamāṇā punaḥ punaḥ // HV_77.39 //
GE07hv_conau:11634: hā hatāsmīti vāśantī $ papāta bhuvi duḥkhitā |
GE07hv_conau:11635: snuṣāṇām ārtanādena % vilalāpa ruroda ca // HV_77.40 //
GE07hv_conau:11636: sā tasya vadanaṃ dīnam $ utsaṅge putragṛddhinī &
GE07hv_conau:11637: kṛtvā putreti karuṇaṃ % vilalāpārtayā girā // HV_77.41 //
GE07hv_conau:11639: kim idaṃ tvaritaṃ tāta % prasthānaṃ kṛtavān asi // HV_77.42 //
GE07hv_conau:11640: prasuptaś cāsi vivṛte $ kiṃ putra śayanaṃ vinā &
GE07hv_conau:11641: tāta naivaṃvidhā bhūmau % śerate kṛtalakṣaṇāḥ // HV_77.43 //
GE07hv_conau:11645: bāndhavebhyo bhayaṃ ghoram % anivāryaṃ bhaviṣyati // HV_77.45 //
GE07hv_conau:11647: jñātibhyo bhayam utpannaṃ % śarīrāntakaraṃ mahat // HV_77.46 //
GE07hv_conau:11649: vinamrasya hy anaukasya (?) $ vaktur vigraham ṛcchataḥ |
GE07hv_conau:11651: sā patiṃ bhūpatiṃ vṛddham $ ugrasenaṃ vicetasam &
GE07hv_conau:11652: uvāca rudatī vākyaṃ % vivatsā saurabhī yathā // HV_77.47 //
GE07hv_conau:11653: ehy ehi rājan dharmātman $ paśya putraṃ janeśvaram &
GE07hv_conau:11660: pretakāryāṇi kāryāṇi % mṛtaḥ kim aparādhyate // HV_77.51 //
GE07hv_conau:11661: evam uktvā patiṃ bhojaṃ $ keśān ārujya duḥkhitā &
GE07hv_conau:11662: putrasya mukham īkṣantī % vilalāpaiva sā bhṛśam // HV_77.52 //
GE07hv_conau:11663: imās te kiṃ kariṣyanti $ bhāryā rājan sukhocitāḥ &
GE07hv_conau:11664: tvāṃ patiṃ supatiṃ prāpya % yā vipannamanorathāḥ // HV_77.53 //
GE07hv_conau:11665: imaṃ te pitaraṃ vṛddhaṃ $ kṛṣṇasya vaśavartinam &
GE07hv_conau:11666: kathaṃ drakṣyāmi śuṣyantaṃ % kāsārasalilaṃ yathā // HV_77.54 //
GE07hv_conau:11667: ahaṃ te jananī putra $ kimarthaṃ nābhibhāṣase &
GE07hv_conau:11668: prasthito dīrgham adhvānaṃ % parityajyya priyaṃ janam // HV_77.55 //
GE07hv_conau:11670: ācchidya mama mandāyā % nīyase nayakovida // HV_77.56 //
GE07hv_conau:11673: nāmāni ca gṛhītāni $ samyagvṛttāni tair guṇaiḥ |
GE07hv_conau:11674: rudanti tava bhṛtyānāṃ % kulāni kulayūthapa // HV_77.57 //
GE07hv_conau:11676: trāhi dīnaṃ janaṃ sarvaṃ % puram antaḥpuraṃ tathā // HV_77.58 //
GE07hv_conau:11679: [h: HV (CE) chapter 78, transliterated by John Brockington, proof-read by John Brockington, version of 12th November 2001 :h]
GE07hv_conau:11681: ugrasenas tu kṛṣṇasya $ samīpaṃ duḥkhito yayau &
GE07hv_conau:11683: sa dadarśa gṛhe kṛṣṇaṃ $ yādavair abhisaṃvṛtam &
GE07hv_conau:11690: vaidhavyaṃ strīsahasrāṇāṃ % kaṃsasyāsya kṛte kṛtam // HV_78.4 //
GE07hv_conau:11692: evam ārtaṃ rudantīṣu % mayā bhartari pātite // HV_78.5 //
GE07hv_conau:11695: kaṃsasya hi vadhaḥ śreyān $ prāg evābhimato mama &
GE07hv_conau:11696: sutām udvejanīyasya % pāpeṣv abhiratasya ca // HV_78.7 //
GE07hv_conau:11698: akliṣṭaṃ maraṇaṃ śreyo % na vidviṣṭasya jīvitam // HV_78.8 //
GE07hv_conau:11699: kaṃsaḥ pāparatiś caiva $ sādhūnāṃ cāpy asaṃmataḥ &
GE07hv_conau:11700: dhikśabdapatitaś caiva % jīvite cāsya kā dayā // HV_78.9 //
GE07hv_conau:11701: svarge tapobhṛtāṃ vāsaḥ $ phalaṃ puṇyasya karmaṇaḥ &
GE07hv_conau:11702: ihāpi yaśasā yuktas % tatrasthair upadhāryate // HV_78.10 //
GE07hv_conau:11703: yadi syur nirvṛttā lokāḥ $ syuś ca dharmaparāḥ prajāḥ &
GE07hv_conau:11704: narā dharmapravṛttāś ca % na nṛpo vikṛto bhavet // HV_78.11 //
GE07hv_conau:11708: kartāraḥ sulabhā loke % duṣkṛtasyeha karmaṇaḥ // HV_78.13 //
GE07hv_conau:11709: hataḥ so 'yaṃ mayā kaṃsaḥ $ sādhv etad avagamyatām &
GE07hv_conau:11710: mūlacchedaḥ kṛtas tasya % viparītasya karmaṇaḥ // HV_78.14 //
GE07hv_conau:11712: na ced dhanyāṃ durācāraṃ $ vinaṅkṣyati tadā jagat |
GE07hv_conau:11713: kaḥ kuryāt khalv idaṃ kāryaṃ $ badhvā pitaram ojasā |
GE07hv_conau:11714: rājyaṃ sakalasāmantaṃ $ kariṣyati sadā hi saḥ |
GE07hv_conau:11715: tad eṣa sāntvyatāṃ sarvaḥ $ śokārtaḥ pramadājanaḥ &
GE07hv_conau:11716: paurāś ca puryāṃ śreṇyaś ca % sāntvyatāṃ sarva eva hi // HV_78.15 //
GE07hv_conau:11726: putra niryātitaḥ krodho $ nīto yāmyāṃ diśaṃ ripuḥ &
GE07hv_conau:11727: svadharmādhigatā kīrtir % nāma viśrāvitaṃ bhuvi // HV_78.18 //
GE07hv_conau:11728: sthāpitaṃ satsu māhātmyaṃ $ śaṅkitā ripavaḥ kṛtāḥ &
GE07hv_conau:11729: sthāpito yādavo vaṃśo % garvitāḥ suhṛdaḥ kṛtāḥ // HV_78.19 //
GE07hv_conau:11731: mitrāṇi tvāṃ bhajiṣyanti % saṃśrayiṣyanti cārthinaḥ // HV_78.20 //
GE07hv_conau:11735: pratigṛhāṇa kṛṣṇedaṃ % kaṃsasya balam avyayam // HV_78.22 //
GE07hv_conau:11736: dhanaṃ dhānyaṃ ca yat kiṃcid $ ratnāny ācchādanāni ca &
GE07hv_conau:11737: [k: all mss (except Ś1 Ñ1 M1-3) G(ed.) ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conau:11738: pratīcchantu niyuktā vai $ tvadīyāḥ kṛṣṇa puruṣāḥ |
GE07hv_conau:11739: striyo hiraṇyaṃ vāsāṃsi % yac cānyad vasu kiṃcana // HV_78.23 //
GE07hv_conau:11740: evaṃ hi vihite yoge $ paryāpte kṛṣṇa vigrahe &
GE07hv_conau:11742: [k: N (except K4 D2) T1-3 G1-3 M4 ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conau:11743: tvaṃ gatiś cāgatiś caiva $ yadūnāṃ yadunandana |
GE07hv_conau:11744: śṛṇu tad bruvatāṃ vīra $ kṛpaṇānām idaṃ vacaḥ &
GE07hv_conau:11746: tava prasādād govinde pretakāryaṃ kriyate ha // HV_78.25 //
GE07hv_conau:11748: sasnuṣo 'haṃ sabhāryaś ca % cariṣyāmi mṛgaiḥ saha // HV_78.26 //
GE07hv_conau:11750: ānṛṇyaṃ laukikaṃ kṛṣṇa % gataḥ kila bhavāmy aham // HV_78.27 //
GE07hv_conau:11751: asyāgniṃ paścimaṃ dattvā $ cittisthāne vidhiṃ vinā &
GE07hv_conau:11753: etan me kṛṣṇa vijñāpyaṃ $ sneho 'tra mama yujyatām &
GE07hv_conau:11754: prāpnotu sugatiṃ tatra % kṛpaṇaḥ paścimāṃ kriyām // HV_78.29 //
GE07hv_conau:11755: etac chrutvā vacas tasya $ kṛṣṇaḥ paramaharṣitaḥ &
GE07hv_conau:11756: pratyuvācograsenaṃ vai % sāntvapūrvam idaṃ vacaḥ // HV_78.30 //
GE07hv_conau:11757: [k: K2.3 Ñ2.3 V1.2B DT1.2 (second time, first time after 25ab) G M ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conau:11758: kālayuktam idaṃ tāta $ tvayaitad bhāṣitaṃ vacaḥ |
GE07hv_conau:11759: sadṛśaṃ rājaśārdūla $ vṛttasya ca kulasya ca &
GE07hv_conau:11760: yat tvaṃ evaṃvidhaṃ brūṣe % gate 'rthe duratikrame // HV_78.31 //
GE07hv_conau:11761: prāpsyate nṛpa saṃskāraṃ $ kaṃsaḥ pretagate 'pi san &
GE07hv_conau:11762: [k: K Ñ2.3 V1.2 B Dn Ds D1-5 T1.3.4 G4 M1-3 G(ed.) (Ñ1 after 29abc,
GE07hv_conau:11763: D6 T2 G1-3.5 M4 after first occurrence of 32cd, V3 after first occurrence
GE07hv_conau:11765: kule mahati te janma $ vedān viditavān asi |
GE07hv_conau:11766: kathaṃ na jñāyate tāta $ niyatir duratikramā || *HV_78.32ab*870:2 |
GE07hv_conau:11767: sthāvarāṇāṃ ca bhūtānāṃ $ jaṅgamānāṃ ca pārthiva |
GE07hv_conau:11775: svayam eva kṛtaṃ karma $ śubhaṃ vā yadi vāśubham |
GE07hv_conau:11776: prāpte kāle tu tat karma $ dṛśyate sarvadehinām || *HV_78.32ab*870:12
GE07hv_conau:11777: eṣā hy antarhitā māyā $ durvijñeyā surair api |
GE07hv_conau:11778: yathāyaṃ muhyate loko hy $ atra karmaiva kāraṇam ||
GE07hv_conau:11780: na hy ayaṃ kāraṇaṃ tatra $ kālaḥ karma ca kāraṇam ||
GE07hv_conau:11782: kālena nidhanaṃ gatvā $ kālenaiva ca jāyate |
GE07hv_conau:11783: kālas tu sarvabhūtānāṃ $ nigrahe pragrahe rataḥ |
GE07hv_conau:11784: tasmāt sarvāṇi bhūtāni $ kālasya vaśagāni vai || *HV_78.32ab*870:20 |
GE07hv_conau:11786: nāhaṃ vai kāraṇaṃ tatra $ kālas tatra tu kāraṇam ||
GE07hv_conau:11787: atha vāhaṃ bhaviṣyāmi $ kāraṇaṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ |
GE07hv_conau:11789: kālas tu balavān rājan $ durvijñeyā hi sā gatiḥ || *HV_78.32ab*870:25
GE07hv_conau:11791: gatiḥ kālasya sā yena $ sarvaṃ kālasya gocaram |
GE07hv_conau:11792: bravīmi yad ahaṃ tāta % tad anuṣṭhīyatāṃ vacaḥ // HV_78.32 //
GE07hv_conau:11793: na hi rājyena me kāryaṃ $ nāpy ahaṃ rājyalālasaḥ &
GE07hv_conau:11794: na cāpi rājyalubdhena % mayā kaṃso nipātitaḥ // HV_78.33 //
GE07hv_conau:11795: kiṃ tu lokahitārthāya $ kīrtyarthaṃ ca sutas tava &

GE07hv_conau:12813: dhruvāya tatra nyavasat $ keśavaḥ saha yādavaiḥ &

GE07hv_conau:12815: tasyāstu vidhivan nāma $ vāstūni ca gadāgrajaḥ &

GE07hv_conau:12826: madhyadeśasya kakudaṃ % dhāma lakṣmyāś ca kevalam // HV_85.2 //
GE07hv_conau:12830: sa kālayavanaś cāpi $ kṛṣṇe kiṃ pratyapadyata // HV_85.4 //
GE07hv_conau:12832: kiṃ cakāra mahābāhur % mahāyogī mahāmanāḥ // HV_85.5 //
GE07hv_conau:12833: kiṃvīryaḥ kālayavanaḥ $ kena jātaś ca vīryavān &
GE07hv_conau:12834: yam asahyaṃ samālakṣya % vyapayāto janārdanaḥ // HV_85.6 //
GE07hv_conau:12836: vṛṣṇīnām andhakānāṃ ca $ gurur gārgyo mahātapāḥ &

GE07hv_conau:12838: tathā hi vartamānaṃ taṃ $ ūrdhvaretasam avyayam &
GE07hv_conau:12840: gārgyaṃ goṣṭhe dvijaṃ syālaḥ $ ṣaṇḍham ity uktavān dvijaḥ |
GE07hv_conau:12841: yadūnāṃ saṃnidhau sarve $ jahasur yādavās tataḥ || *HV_85.8ab*965:2 |
GE07hv_conau:12844: syālo 'bhiśaptavān gārgyam % apumān iti bhūpate // HV_85.8 //
GE07hv_conau:12845: so 'bhiśaptas tadā rājan $ nagare tv amitaṃjaye &
GE07hv_conau:12846: lipsuḥ putraṃ tato gatvā % tapas tepe sudāruṇam // HV_85.9 //
GE07hv_conau:12847: tato dvādaśa varṣāṇi $ so 'yaś cūrṇam abhakṣayat &
GE07hv_conau:12849: rudras tasmai varaṃ prādāt $ samarthaṃ yudhi nigrahe &
GE07hv_conau:12850: vṛṣṇīnām andhakānāṃ ca % sarvatejomayaṃ sutam // HV_85.11 //
GE07hv_conau:12851: tataḥ śuśrāva taṃ rājā $ yavanādhipatir varam &
GE07hv_conau:12853: tam upānāyya sa nṛpaḥ $ sāntvayitvā dvijottamam &
GE07hv_conau:12856: dhārayām āsa gārgyasya % garbhaṃ durdharam acyutam // HV_85.14 //
GE07hv_conau:12858: sa kālayavano nāma % jajñe śūro mahābalaḥ \
GE07hv_conau:12859: aputrasyātha rājñas tu vavṛdhe 'ntaḥpure śiśuḥ // HV_85.15 //
GE07hv_conau:12860: tasminn uparate rājan $ sa kālayavano nṛpaḥ &
GE07hv_conau:12862: vṛṣṇyandhakakulaṃ tasya nārado vai nyavedayat // HV_85.16 //
GE07hv_conau:12863: jñātvā tu varadānaṃ tan $ nāradān madhusūdanaḥ &
GE07hv_conau:12864: upapraikṣata tejasvī % vardhantaṃ yavaneṣu tam // HV_85.17 //
GE07hv_conau:12865: sa vivṛddho yadā rājā $ yavanānāṃ mahābalaḥ &
GE07hv_conau:12866: tata enaṃ nṛpā mlecchāḥ % saṃśrityānuyayus tadā // HV_85.18 //
GE07hv_conau:12867: śakās tuṣārā daradāḥ $ pāradās taṅgaṇāḥ khaśāḥ &
GE07hv_conau:12868: pahlavāḥ śataśaś cānye % mlecchā haimavatās tathā // HV_85.19 //
GE07hv_conau:12869: sa taiḥ parivṛto rājā $ dasyubhiḥ śalabhair iva &
GE07hv_conau:12872: pṛthivīṃ kampayām āsa % sainyena mahatā tadā // HV_85.21 //
GE07hv_conau:12874: mūtreṇa śakṛtā caiva % sainyena sasṛje nadīm // HV_85.22 //
GE07hv_conau:12876: tato 'śvaśakṛd ityeva % nāma nadyā babhūva ha // HV_85.23 //
GE07hv_conau:12877: tat sainyaṃ mahad āyād vai $ śrutvā vṛṣṇyandhakāgraṇīḥ &
GE07hv_conau:12878: vāsudevaḥ samānāyya % jñātīn idam uvāca ha // HV_85.24 //
GE07hv_conau:12880: avadhyaś cāpi naḥ śatrur % varadānāt pinākinaḥ // HV_85.25 //
GE07hv_conau:12882: matto madabalābhyāṃ ca % yuddham eva cikīrṣati \
GE07hv_conau:12883: etāvān iha vāsaś ca kathito nāradena me // HV_85.26 //
GE07hv_conau:12884: [k: Ñ2.3V BDs D3.5.6 G2 ins. (Dn after 27ab): :k]
GE07hv_conau:12885: etāvati ca vaktavyaṃ $ sāmaiva paramaṃ matam |
GE07hv_conau:12886: jarāsaṃdhaś ca no rājā $ nityam eva na mṛṣyate &
GE07hv_conau:12888: kecit kaṃsavadhāc cāpi $ viraktās tadgatā nṛpāḥ &
GE07hv_conau:12889: samāśritya jarāsaṃdham % asmān icchanti bādhitum // HV_85.28 //
GE07hv_conau:12890: bahavo jñātayaś caiva $ yadūnāṃ nihatā nṛpaiḥ &
GE07hv_conau:12891: vivardhituṃ na śakṣyāmaḥ % pure 'sminn iti keśavaḥ \
GE07hv_conau:12895: kṛtvā ca niścayaṃ sarve $ palāyanam arocayan || *HV_85.29cd*967:3 |
GE07hv_conau:12898: apayāne matiṃ kṛtvā dūtaṃ tasmai sasarja ha // HV_85.29 //
GE07hv_conau:12900: ghoram āśīviṣaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ % kṛṣṇaḥ prākṣepayat tadā // HV_85.30 //
GE07hv_conau:12901: tatas taṃ mudrayitvā tu $ svena dūtena hārayat &
GE07hv_conau:12902: nidarśanārthaṃ govindo % bhīṣayāṇaś ca taṃ nṛpam \
GE07hv_conau:12903: sa dūtaḥ kālayavanaṃ darśayām āsa taṃ ghaṭam // HV_85.31 //
GE07hv_conau:12905: idaṃ covāca rājānaṃ $ rājñāṃ samsadi dūtakaḥ |
GE07hv_conau:12906: bho rājann āha kṛṣṇas tvāṃ $ kim ebhiḥ śalabhais tava |
GE07hv_conau:12907: aham ekas tavaiteṣāṃ $ samartho vāraṇe prabhuḥ || *HV_85.31*968:3 |
GE07hv_conau:12908: tvāṃ ca hatvā nṛpaśreṣṭha $ sabalaṃ sasuhṛdgaṇam |
GE07hv_conau:12909: idaṃ tava balaṃ rājan $ grahīṣyāmīti niścitam || *HV_85.31*968:5 |
GE07hv_conau:12910: anyathā gaccha rājaṃs tvaṃ $ balenānena saṃyutaḥ |
GE07hv_conau:12911: ity uktvā darśayām āsa $ ghaṭaṃ kṛṣṇapracoditam |
GE07hv_conau:12913: tat kālayavano budhvā % trāsanaṃ yādavaiḥ kṛtam \
GE07hv_conau:12914: pipīlikānāṃ caṇḍānāṃ pūrayām āsa taṃ ghaṭam // HV_85.32 //
GE07hv_conau:12916: ślokam ekaṃ likhitvā tu $ ghaṭamadhye 'kṣipat tadā |
GE07hv_conau:12917: sa sarpo bahubhis tīkṣṇaiḥ $ sarvatas taiḥ pipīlikaiḥ &
GE07hv_conau:12920: preṣayām āsa kṛṣṇāya % bāhulyam upavarṇayan // HV_85.34 //
GE07hv_conau:12922: dūtānītaṃ harir dṛṣṭvā $ patraṃ tad vācayaṃs tadā |
GE07hv_conau:12924: sphuran tam api nāgendraṃ $ bhakṣayiṣyanti kīṭikāḥ |
GE07hv_conau:12925: vāsudevas tu taṃ dṛṣṭvā $ yogaṃ vihitam ātmanaḥ &
GE07hv_conau:12926: utsṛjya mathurām āśu % dvārakām abhijagmivān // HV_85.35 //
GE07hv_conau:12928: niveśya dvārakāṃ rājan % vṛṣṇīn āśvāsya caiva ha // HV_85.36 //
GE07hv_conau:12931: taṃ dṛṣṭvā niryayau hṛṣṭaḥ $ sa kālayavano ruṣā &
GE07hv_conau:12932: prekṣāpūrvaṃ ca kṛṣṇo 'pi % niścakrāma mahābalaḥ // HV_85.38 //
GE07hv_conau:12934: na cainam aśakad rājā % grahītuṃ yogadharmiṇam // HV_85.39 //
GE07hv_conau:12936: hastaprāptam ivātmānaṃ $ hariṇā sa pade pade |
GE07hv_conau:12943: ko hi nāma jagannāthaṃ $ balād yātuṃ priyād ṛte |
GE07hv_conau:12945: māndhātus tu suto rājā $ mucukundo mahāyaśāḥ &
GE07hv_conau:12947: yatra tiṣṭhati rājendras $ tatra cāśu viveśa vai |
GE07hv_conau:12948: purā devāsure yuddhe % kṛtakarmā mahābalaḥ // HV_85.40 //
GE07hv_conau:12949: vareṇa cchandito devair $ nidrām eva gṛhītavān &
GE07hv_conau:12950: śrāntasya tasya vāg evaṃ % tadā prādur abhūt kila // HV_85.41 //
GE07hv_conau:12951: prasuptam bodhayed yo māṃ $ taṃ daheyam ahaṃ surāḥ &
GE07hv_conau:12952: cakṣuṣā krodhadīptena % evam āha punaḥ punaḥ // HV_85.42 //
GE07hv_conau:12953: evam astv iti śakras tam $ uvāca tridaśaiḥ saha &
GE07hv_conau:12954: sa surair abhyanujñāto % lokaṃ mānuṣam āgamat // HV_85.43 //
GE07hv_conau:12956: suṣvāpa kālam etaṃ vai % yāvat kṛṣṇasya darśanam // HV_85.44 //
GE07hv_conau:12958: varadānaṃ ca devebhyas % tejas tasya ca bhūpateḥ // HV_85.45 //
GE07hv_conau:12959: anugamyamānaḥ kṛṣṇaś ca $ tena mlecchena śatruṇā &
GE07hv_conau:12960: tāṃ guhāṃ mucukundasya % praviveśa vinītavat // HV_85.46 //
GE07hv_conau:12962: pītāmbareṇa svīyena $ tam ācchādya sa bhūpatim |
GE07hv_conau:12964: saṃdarśanapathaṃ tyaktvā % tasthau buddhimatāṃ varaḥ // HV_85.47 //
GE07hv_conau:12967: vāsudevaṃ tu taṃ matvā $ ghaṭṭayām āsa pārthivam &
GE07hv_conau:12970: cukopa nicrācchedena % pādasparśena tena ca // HV_85.50 //
GE07hv_conau:12971: saṃsmṛtya ca varaṃ śakrād $ avaikṣata tamagrataḥ &
GE07hv_conau:12972: sa dṛṣṭamātraḥ kruddhena % saṃprajajvāla sarvataḥ // HV_85.51 //
GE07hv_conau:12973: dadāha pāvakas taṃ tu $ śuṣkaṃ vṛkṣam ivāśaniḥ &
GE07hv_conau:12976: kṛtakāryo 'bravīd dhīmān % idaṃ vacanam uttamam // HV_85.53 //
GE07hv_conau:12978: kṛtaṃ me sumahat kāryaṃ % svasti te 'stu vrajāmy aham // HV_85.54 //
GE07hv_conau:12980: parivṛttaṃ yugaṃ mene % kālena mahatā tataḥ // HV_85.55 //
GE07hv_conau:12989: śaṅkitaḥ śanakaiḥ kṛṣṇaṃ $ durdharṣam iva tejasā |
GE07hv_conau:12990: uvāca rājā govindaṃ $ ko bhavān kim ihāgataḥ &
GE07hv_conau:12991: kaś ca kālaḥ prasuptasya % yadi jānāsi kathyatām // HV_85.56 //
GE07hv_conau:12995: kiṃ svit tejasvināṃ tejo $ bhagavāṃs tvaṃ vibhāvasuḥ |
GE07hv_conau:12996: sūryaḥ somo mahendro vā $ lokapālo 'paro 'pi vā || *HV_85.56*976:4 |
GE07hv_conau:12998: yad bādhase guhādhvāntaṃ $ pradīpaḥ prabhayā yathā || *HV_85.56*976:6
GE07hv_conau:13000: svaṃ janma karma gotraṃ vā $ kathyatāṃ yadi rocate |
GE07hv_conau:13003: tasya putro yadur jyeṣṭhaś % catvāro 'nye yavīyasaḥ // HV_85.57 //
GE07hv_conau:13005: vāsudevaṃ vijānīhi % nṛpate mām ihāgatam // HV_85.58 //
GE07hv_conau:13007: idaṃ kaliyugaṃ viddhi % kim anyat karavāṇi te // HV_85.59 //
GE07hv_conau:13008: mama śatrus tvayā dagdho $ devadattavaro nṛpa &
GE07hv_conau:13009: avadhyo yo mayā saṃkhye % bhaved varṣaśatair api // HV_85.60 //
GE07hv_conau:13019: evaṃ stutas tadā viṣṇur $ mucukundena dhīmatā |
GE07hv_conau:13020: vareṇa cchandayām āsa $ bhagavān acyutas tadā || *HV_85.60*977:8 |
GE07hv_conau:13021: punar apy abravīt kṛṣṇo $ mucukundaṃ mahābhujam |
GE07hv_conau:13023: uttiṣṭhottiṣṭha bhadraṃ te $ yathākāmaṃ caratv iha |
GE07hv_conau:13024: ityuktaḥ sa tu kṛṣṇena $ nirjagāma guhāmukhāt &
GE07hv_conau:13027: tato dadarśa pṛthivīm $ āvṛtāṃ hrasvakair naraiḥ &
GE07hv_conau:13029: pareṇādhiṣṭhitaṃ caiva rājyaṃ kevalam ātmanaḥ // HV_85.62 //
GE07hv_conau:13031: yat syāt tvaddarśane puṇyaṃ $ tan me kṛṣṇa bhaved iti |
GE07hv_conau:13033: himavantam agād rājā % tapase dhṛtamānasaḥ // HV_85.63 //
GE07hv_conau:13034: tataḥ sa tapa āsthāya $ vinirmucya kalevaram &
GE07hv_conau:13035: āruroha divaṃ rājā % karmabhiḥ svair jitaṃ śubhaiḥ // HV_85.64 //
GE07hv_conau:13037: ghātayitvātmanaḥ śatruṃ % tat sainyaṃ pratyapadyata // HV_85.65 //
GE07hv_conau:13042: ādāyopayayau dhīmāṃs % tat sainyaṃ nihateśvaram // HV_85.66 //
GE07hv_conau:13043: nivedayām āsa tato narādhipe $ tad ugrasene pratipūrṇamānasaḥ &
GE07hv_conau:13044: janārdano dvāravatīṃ ca tāṃ purīm % aśobhayat tena dhanena bhūriṇā //
GE07hv_conau:13045: [h: HV (CE) chapter 86, transliterated by Kreshimir Krnic, proof-read by Kreshimir Krnic, version of June 20, 2004 :h]
GE07hv_conau:13047: kṛṣṇāya ca namas tubhyaṃ $ rāmarāmāya te namaḥ |
GE07hv_conau:13048: vāmanāya namas tubhyaṃ $ kapilāya namo 'stu te || *HV_86.0*980:2 |
GE07hv_conau:13049: nānārūpa namas tubhyaṃ $ namas te karmasākṣiṇe |
GE07hv_conau:13050: viśvarūpa namas tubhyaṃ $ hṛṣīkeśāya te namaḥ || *HV_86.0*980:4 |
GE07hv_conau:13052: uttarāṃ diśam āśritya $ tapam ācara sāttvikam |
GE07hv_conau:13055: kṛtajapyo hṛṣīkeśo % vanānte niṣasāda ha // HV_86.1 //
GE07hv_conau:13058: rohiṇyām ahani śreṣṭhe $ svasti vācya dvijottamān &
GE07hv_conau:13061: provāca vadatāṃ śreṣṭho % devān vṛtraripur yathā // HV_86.4 //
GE07hv_conau:13063: nāma cāsyāḥ kṛtaṃ puryāḥ % khyātiṃ yad upayāsyati // HV_86.5 //
GE07hv_conau:13064: iyaṃ dvāravatī nāma $ pṛthivyāṃ nirmitā mayā &
GE07hv_conau:13066: tāny evāsyāḥ kārayiṣye $ cihnāny āyatanāni ca &
GE07hv_conau:13069: catvarān rājamārgāṃś ca % samān antaḥpurāṇi ca // HV_86.7 //
GE07hv_conau:13073: mīyantāṃ rājamārgāś ca % prākārasya ca yā gatiḥ // HV_86.9 //
GE07hv_conau:13075: niyujyantāṃ ca deśeṣu % preṣyakarmakarā janāḥ // HV_86.10 //
GE07hv_conau:13079: puṇye 'hani mahārāja % dvijātīn abhipūjya ca // HV_86.12 //
GE07hv_conau:13081: sthapatīn atha govindas % tatrovāca mahāmatiḥ // HV_86.13 //
GE07hv_conau:13084: te tatheti mahābāhum $ uktvā sthapatayas tadā &
GE07hv_conau:13087: sthānāni vidadhuś cātra % brahmādīnāṃ yathākramam // HV_86.16 //
GE07hv_conau:13089: caturdaivāni catvāri % dvārāṇi vidadhuś ca te \
GE07hv_conau:13092: puryāḥ kṣipraṃ niveṣārthaṃ % cintayām āsa mādhavaḥ // HV_86.18 //
GE07hv_conau:13093: tasya daivī sthitā buddhiś $ capalā kṣiprakāriṇī &
GE07hv_conau:13094: purī sā vai priyakarī % yadūnām abhivardhanī // HV_86.19 //
GE07hv_conau:13096: viśvakarmā svamatyā vai % purīṃ saṃsthāpayiśyati // HV_86.20 //
GE07hv_conau:13099: tasminn eva tataḥ kāle $ śilpācāryo mahāmatiḥ &
GE07hv_conau:13100: viśvakarmā suraśreṣṭhaḥ % kṛṣṇasya pramukhe sthitaḥ // HV_86.22 //
GE07hv_conau:13102: daivena manasā kśipraṃ $ tava viṣṇo dhṛtavrata &
GE07hv_conau:13103: kiṃkaraḥ samanuprāptaḥ % śādhi māṃ kiṃ karomi te // HV_86.23 //
GE07hv_conau:13104: yathā syād devadeveśas $ tryambakaś ca yathāvyayaḥ &
GE07hv_conau:13105: tathā tvaṃ deva mānyo 'si % viśeṣo nāsti me prabho // HV_86.24 //
GE07hv_conau:13107: eṣo 'smi paridṛṣṭārthaḥ % kiṃ karomi praśādhi mām // HV_86.25 //
GE07hv_conau:13109: pratyuvāca yaduśreṣṭhaḥ % kaṃsārir atulaṃ vacaḥ // HV_86.26 //
GE07hv_conau:13110: śrutārtho devaguhyasya $ bhavāny atra vayaṃ sthitāḥ &
GE07hv_conau:13111: avaśyaṃ tv iha kartavyaṃ % sadanaṃ me surottama // HV_86.27 //
GE07hv_conau:13112: tad iyaṃ bhūḥ prakāśārthaṃ $ niveśyā mayi suvrata &
GE07hv_conau:13113: matprabhāvānurūpaiś ca % gṛhaiś ceyaṃ samantataḥ // HV_86.28 //
GE07hv_conau:13114: uttamā ca pṛthivyāṃ vai $ yathā svarge 'marāvatī &
GE07hv_conau:13115: tatheyaṃ hi tvayā kāryā % śakto hy asi mahāmate // HV_86.29 //
GE07hv_conau:13116: mama sthānam idaṃ kāryaṃ $ yathā vai tridive tathā &
GE07hv_conau:13117: martyāḥ paśyantu me lakṣmīṃ % puryā yadukulasya ca // HV_86.30 //
GE07hv_conau:13118: evam uktas tataḥ prāha $ viśvakarmā matīśvaraḥ &
GE07hv_conau:13120: sarvam etat kariṣyāmi $ yat tvayābhihitaṃ prabho &
GE07hv_conau:13121: purī tv iyaṃ janasyāsya % na paryāptā bhaviṣyati // HV_86.32 //
GE07hv_conau:13122: bhaviṣyati ca vistīrṇā $ vṛddhir asyās tu śobhanā &
GE07hv_conau:13123: catvāraḥ sāgarā hy asyāṃ % vicariṣyanti rūpiṇaḥ // HV_86.33 //
GE07hv_conau:13124: yadīcchet sāgaraḥ kiṃcid $ utsraṣṭum iha toyarāṭ &

GE07hv_conau:16161: uttiṣṭhottiṣṭha bhadraṃ te $ viṣādaṃ mā kṛthāḥ śubhe &

GE07hv_conau:16164: aprāpta eva nagaraṃ % pitrā te mṛdito raṇe \
GE07hv_conau:16165: ayaṃ devasamūhasya bhayadas te pitā raṇe // HV_107.26 //
GE07hv_conau:16166: [k: After 107.26cd, D6 T1 G1.2.4.5 M G(ed.) ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conau:16167: airāvataḥ sa mṛdito $ gadayā cāsya bhāmini |
GE07hv_conau:16169: [k: After 107.26, N (except Ś1) T4 G5 ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conau:16174: evaṃ saṃdūṣitā sādhvī $ kathaṃ jīvitum utsahe &
GE07hv_conau:16175: pitaraṃ kiṃ nu vakṣyāmi % devaśatrum ariṃdamam // HV_107.27 //
GE07hv_conau:16177: śreyo hi maraṇaṃ manye % na me śreyo 'dya jīvitam // HV_107.28 //
GE07hv_conau:16178: [k: K1.3.4 Ñ2V BD T4 G1.2.5 G (ed.) ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conau:16179: īpsito vā yatha ko 'pi $ puruṣo 'dhigato hi me |
GE07hv_conau:16180: jāgratīva yathāhaṃ syām $ avastheyaṃ kṛtā mama |
GE07hv_conau:16181: niśāyāṃ jāgratī vāhaṃ $ nītā kena daśām imām |
GE07hv_conau:16182: katham evaṃ kṛtā nāma $ kanyā jīvitum utsahe &
GE07hv_conau:16184: jīvituṃ spṛhayen nārī sādhvīnām agrataḥ sthitā // HV_107.29 //
GE07hv_conau:16186: vilalāpa ciraṃ kālam % uṣā kamalalocanā // HV_107.30 //
GE07hv_conau:16188: ūcur aśruparītākṣya % uṣāṃ sarvāḥ samāgatāḥ // HV_107.31 //
GE07hv_conau:16189: duṣṭena manasā devi $ śubhaṃ yadi vāsubham &
GE07hv_conau:16190: kriyate na ca te subhru % kaccid duṣṭaṃ manas tava // HV_107.32 //
GE07hv_conau:16192: prasabhaṃ devi saṃyogād $ yadi bhuktāsi bhāmini |
GE07hv_conau:16194: vyabhicāreṇa te devi % nāsti kaścid vyatikramaḥ // HV_107.33 //
GE07hv_conau:16196: na ca svapnakṛto doṣo $ martyaloke 'sti sundari |
GE07hv_conau:16197: evaṃ viprarṣayo devi $ dharmajñāḥ kathayanti vai |
GE07hv_conau:16198: manasā caiva vācā ca $ karmaṇā ca viśeṣataḥ &
GE07hv_conau:16199: duṣṭā yā tribhir etais tu % pāpā sā procyate bhuvi // HV_107.34 //
GE07hv_conau:16200: na va te duṣyate bhīru $ manaḥ prajavitaṃ sadā &
GE07hv_conau:16201: kathaṃ tvaṃ doṣaduṣṭā vai % niyatā brahmacāriṇī // HV_107.35 //
GE07hv_conau:16202: yadi suptā satī sādhvī $ śuddhabhāvā manasvinī &
GE07hv_conau:16203: imām avasthāṃ nītā tvaṃ % naiva dharmo vilupyate // HV_107.36 //
GE07hv_conau:16204: yasyā duṣṭaṃ manaḥ pūrvaṃ $ karmaṇā copapāditam &
GE07hv_conau:16205: tām āhur asatīṃ nāma % satī tvam asi bhāmini // HV_107.37 //
GE07hv_conau:16207: imām avasthāṃ nītāsi % kālo hi duratikramaḥ // HV_107.38 //
GE07hv_conau:16209: kumbhāṇḍaduhitā vākyaṃ % paramaṃ tv idam abravīt // HV_107.39 //
GE07hv_conau:16211: tyaja śokaṃ viśālākṣi $ apāpā tvaṃ varānane |
GE07hv_conau:16212: smṛtaṃ me yad idaṃ vākyaṃ $ yāthātathyena tac chṛṇu |
GE07hv_conau:16213: uṣe yad uktā devyāsi $ bhartāraṃ dhyāyatī tadā &
GE07hv_conau:16214: samīpe devadevasya % smara bhāmini tad vacaḥ // HV_107.40 //
GE07hv_conau:16215: dvādaśyāṃ śuklapakṣasya $ vaiśākhe māsi yo niśi &
GE07hv_conau:16216: harmye śayānāṃ rudatīṃ % strībhāvam upaneṣyati // HV_107.41 //
GE07hv_conau:16217: bhavitā sa hi te bhartā $ śūraḥ śatrunibarhaṇaḥ &
GE07hv_conau:16218: ity uvāca tato hṛṣṭā % devī tava manogatam // HV_107.42 //
GE07hv_conau:16219: na hi tad vacanaṃ mithyā $ pārvatyā yad udāhṛtam &
GE07hv_conau:16220: tattvaṃ kim idam atyarthaṃ % rodiṣīndunibhānane // HV_107.43 //
GE07hv_conau:16221: ity evam uktā vacanaṃ $ smṛtvā devīvacas tataḥ &
GE07hv_conau:16222: abhavan naṣṭaśokā sā % bāṇaputrī śubhekṣaṇā // HV_107.44 //
GE07hv_conau:16224: smṛtvā tu vacanaṃ devyāḥ $ pratyuvāca sakhīṃ tadā |
GE07hv_conau:16226: smarāmi bhāmini vaco $ devyāḥ krīḍāgate bhave &
GE07hv_conau:16227: yathoktaṃ sarvam akhilaṃ % prāptaṃ harmyatale mayā // HV_107.45 //
GE07hv_conau:16228: bhartā tu mama yady eṣa $ lokanāthasya bhāryayā &
GE07hv_conau:16229: vyādiṣṭaḥ sa kathaṃ jñeyas % tatra kāryaṃ vidhīyatām // HV_107.46 //
GE07hv_conau:16230: ity evam ukte vacane $ kumbhāṇḍaduhitā punaḥ &
GE07hv_conau:16232: na hi tasya kulaṃ devi $ na kīrtir nāpi pauruṣam &
GE07hv_conau:16233: kaścij jānāti tattvena % kim idaṃ tvaṃ vihanyase // HV_107.48 //
GE07hv_conau:16234: adṛṣṭaś cāśrutaś caiva $ dṛṣṭaḥ svapne tvayānaghe &
GE07hv_conau:16235: kathaṃ jñeyo bhaved bhīru % so 'smābhī ratitaskaraḥ // HV_107.49 //
GE07hv_conau:16237: rudatī prasabhaṃ bhuktā % praviśyāntaḥpuraṃ sakhi // HV_107.50 //
GE07hv_conau:16238: na hy ayaṃ prākṛtaḥ kaścid $ yaḥ praviṣṭaḥ prasahya naḥ &
GE07hv_conau:16240: ādityā vasavo rudrā $ aśvinau ca mahaujasau &
GE07hv_conau:16241: na śaktāḥ śoṇitapuraṃ % praveṣṭuṃ bhīmavikramāḥ // HV_107.52 //
GE07hv_conau:16243: purīṃ śāsati bāṇe tu $ jitvā śakraṃ śacīpatim |
GE07hv_conau:16245: praviṣṭaḥ śoṇitapuraṃ % bāṇam ākramya mūrdhani // HV_107.53 //
GE07hv_conau:16247: ko nu nāma jagaty asmin $ manaḥ kartuṃ mahāsure |
GE07hv_conau:16248: śāsaty etat puraṃ devi $ manuṣyo jīvitaspṛhaḥ |
GE07hv_conau:16249: praviśet tam avajñāya $ bāṇaṃ kiṃ vāpi dharṣaṇam |
GE07hv_conau:16251: kas tasyā jīvitenārtho % bhogair vā syāc chubhekṣaṇe // HV_107.54 //
GE07hv_conau:16252: dhanyāsy anugṛhītāsi $ yasyās te patir īdṛśaḥ &
GE07hv_conau:16253: prāpto devyāḥ prasādena % pārvatyā mattakāśini // HV_107.55 //
GE07hv_conau:16254: idaṃ tu te kāryatamaṃ $ śṛṇu tvaṃ vai mayeritam &
GE07hv_conau:16255: vijñeyo yasya putras tu % yan nāmā yat kulaś ca saḥ // HV_107.56 //
GE07hv_conau:16256: ity evam ukte vacane $ tatroṣā kāmamohitā &
GE07hv_conau:16260: uvāca kumbhāṇḍasutāṃ % kathaṃ jñāsyāmahe sakhi // HV_107.57 //
GE07hv_conau:16262: tvam eva cintaya sakhi $ nottaraṃ pratibhāti me |
GE07hv_conau:16263: svakārye muhyate loko $ yathā jīvaṃ labhāmy aham || *HV_107.57*1179:2
GE07hv_conau:16264: uṣāyā vacanaṃ śrutvā $ rāmā vākyam idaṃ punaḥ |
GE07hv_conau:16267: apsarā citralekhā vai $ kṣipraṃ vijñāpyatāṃ sakhi ||
GE07hv_conau:16268: asyāḥ sarvam aśeṣeṇa $ trailokyaṃ viditaṃ sadā || *HV_107.57*1179:7 |
GE07hv_conau:16270: tām apsarasam ānāyya $ citralekhāṃ sakhīṃ priyām |
GE07hv_conau:16273: sā tac chrutvā tu vacanam $ uṣāyāḥ parikīrtitam |
GE07hv_conau:16275: tataḥ sā cintayāviṣṭā $ vacanaṃ prāha durvacaḥ &
GE07hv_conau:16276: citralekhām apsarasaṃ % praṇayāt tāṃ sakhīṃ sakhī // HV_107.58 //
GE07hv_conau:16277: paramaṃ śṛṇu me vākyaṃ $ yat tvāṃ vakṣyāmi bhāmini &
GE07hv_conau:16278: bhartāraṃ yadi me 'dya tvaṃ % nānayiṣyasi matpriyam // HV_107.59 //
GE07hv_conau:16280: tyakṣyāmy ahaṃ priyān prāṇāṃs % tataḥ kamalalocane // HV_107.60 //
GE07hv_conau:16281: vikralekhābravīd vākyam $ uṣāṃ tāṃ hasatī śanaiḥ &
GE07hv_conau:16282: naiṣo 'rthaḥ śakyate 'smābhir % vettuṃ bhāmini suvrate // HV_107.61 //
GE07hv_conau:16284: na kulena na varṇena $ na śīlena na rūpataḥ |
GE07hv_conau:16285: na deśataś ca vijñātaḥ $ sa hi coro mayā sakhi |
GE07hv_conau:16286: kiṃ tu śakyam idaṃ kāryaṃ $ buddhipūrvaṃ mayā sakhi &
GE07hv_conau:16287: prāptuṃ tac chṛṇu me vākyaṃ % yathā kāmam avāpsyasi // HV_107.62 //
GE07hv_conau:16292: ye viśiṣṭāḥ prabhāvena % rūpeṇābhijanena ca // HV_107.63 //
GE07hv_conau:16293: yathāpradhānāṃs tān sarvān $ ālikhiṣyāmy ahaṃ sakhi &
GE07hv_conau:16294: manuṣyaloke ye cāpi % pravarā lokaviśrutāḥ // HV_107.64 //
GE07hv_conau:16295: saptarātreṇa te bhīru $ darśayiṣyāmi tān aham &
GE07hv_conau:16296: tato vijñāya paṭṭasthaṃ % bhartāraṃ pratilapsyase // HV_107.65 //
GE07hv_conau:16298: na darśaye yadi sakhi $ tarhi vahnim ahaṃ viśe |

GE07hv_conau:16301: kriyatām evam ity āha $ citralekhāṃ sakhīṃ priyām ||
GE07hv_conau:16303: ity uktvā saptarātreṇa $ kṛtvālekhyagatāṃs tu tān &

GE07hv_conau:16305: tataḥ prāstīrya paṭṭaṃ sā $ citralekhā svayaṃkṛtam &

GE07hv_conau:16309: ete deveṣu ye mukhyās $ tathā dānavavaṃśajāḥ &
GE07hv_conau:16310: kiṃ naroragayakṣāṇāṃ % rākṣasānāṃ ca sarvaśaḥ // HV_107.68 //
GE07hv_conau:16313: manuṣyāṇāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ $ ye viśiṣṭatamā narāḥ &

GE07hv_conau:16315: yas te bhartā yathārūpo $ yathābhilaṣitaḥ sakhi &
GE07hv_conau:16316: taṃ tvaṃ pratyabhijānīhi % svapne yaṃ dṛṣṭavaty asi // HV_107.70 //
GE07hv_conau:16317: tataḥ krameṇa sarvāṃs tān $ dṛṣṭvā sā mattakāśinī &
GE07hv_conau:16320: atītya ca yadūn sarvān % dadarśa yadunandanam // HV_107.71 //
GE07hv_conau:16322: balabhadram atho dṛṣṭvā $ pradyumnam atha sātyakim |
GE07hv_conau:16323: dadarśa yadusiṃhaṃ taṃ $ pautraṃ viṣṇor mahātmanaḥ |
GE07hv_conau:16324: aniruddhaṃ raṇe ruddhaṃ $ pañcabāṇam iva sthitam || *HV_107.71*1188:3
GE07hv_conau:16325: paṭe sthitaṃ tato dṛṣṭvā $ vīraṃ citrātmanā yadum |
GE07hv_conau:16327: abravīc citralekhāṃ tām % ayaṃ coraḥ sa vai sakhi // HV_107.72 //
GE07hv_conau:16328: yenāhaṃ dūṣitā pūrvaṃ $ svapne harmyagatā satī &

GE07hv_conau:16331: guṇaśīlābhijanato % nāma kiṃ cāsya bhāmini // HV_107.74 //

GE07hv_conau:16344: bhartā tava viśālākṣi % prādyumnir bhīmavikramaḥ // HV_107.75 //
GE07hv_conau:16345: na hy asya triṣu lokeṣu $ sadṛśo 'sti parākrame &
GE07hv_conau:16346: utpāṭya parvatān eṣa % parvatair eva śātayet // HV_107.76 //
GE07hv_conau:16348: tryakṣapatnyā samādiṣṭaḥ % sadṛśaḥ sajjanaḥ patiḥ // HV_107.77 //
GE07hv_conau:16350: yady enaṃ me viśālākṣi $ bhartāram amaropamam &

GE07hv_conau:16352: tvam evātra viśālākṣi $ yogyā bhava varānane |

GE07hv_conau:16356: upāyaś cintyatāṃ bhīru $ apratarkyaṃ priye sukham |
GE07hv_conau:16358: bhaved āpatsu yan mitraṃ $ tan mitraṃ śasyate budhaiḥ |
GE07hv_conau:16359: kāmārtā cāsmi suśroṇi $ bhava me prāṇadhāriṇī |
GE07hv_conau:16360: adya nānayasi kṣipraṃ % prāṇāṃs tyakṣyāmy ahaṃ śubhe // HV_107.78 //

GE07hv_conau:16363: yathā bāṇasya nagaraṃ $ rakṣyate devi sarvataḥ &
GE07hv_conau:16364: dvārakāpi tathā bhīru % durādharṣā viśeṣataḥ // HV_107.80 //
GE07hv_conau:16365: [k: N (except Ś1 Ñ1) T4 G2.4.5 ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conau:16372: na ca śakyam avijñātaiḥ $ praveṣṭuṃ dvārakāṃ purīm &

GE07hv_conau:16375: tato virama buddhiṃ tvaṃ $ duḥprāpāt svapnavastunaḥ |
GE07hv_conau:16376: ātmānaṃ māṃ ca rakṣasva % pitaraṃ ca viśeṣataḥ // HV_107.81 //
GE07hv_conau:16379: [k: Ś1 M4 om. the ref. After the ref. Ñ (except Ś1 Ñ1) T4 G1.2.4.5
GE07hv_conau:16382: kiṃ me bahuvilāpena $ śrūyatāṃ sakhi kāraṇam |
GE07hv_conau:16383: yady ahaṃ taṃ na paśyāmi % yāsyāmi yamasādanam // HV_107.82 //
GE07hv_conau:16384: [k: N(except Ś1 Ñ1) T4 G2.4.5 ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conau:16385: dūtam āsādya kāryāṇāṃ $ siddhir bhavati bhāmini |

GE07hv_conau:16388: kṣipram ānaya me kāntaṃ % prāṇāṃs tyakṣyāmi vā priyān // HV_107.83 //
GE07hv_conau:16389: [k: N (except Ś1 Ñ1) T4 G2.4.5 ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conau:16390: jīvitasya hi saṃdehaṃ $ kṣayaṃ caiva kulasya ca |

GE07hv_conau:16393: tvaṃ ca śaktā viśālākṣi $ dvārakāyāḥ praveśane |
GE07hv_conau:16394: saṃstutāsi mayā bhīru $ kuru me priyadarśanam |
GE07hv_conau:16396: eṣā gacchāmy ahaṃ bhīru $ praviśya dvārakāṃ purīm &
GE07hv_conau:16400: kāritā ca samudyogaṃ $ priyaiḥ kāntaiś ca bhāṣitaiḥ |
GE07hv_conau:16401: bhartāram ānayāmy adya % tava vṛṣṇikulodvaham // HV_107.84 //
GE07hv_conau:16402: [k: N (except Ś1 K1 Ñ1) T4 G2.4.5 ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conau:16404: sā vacas tathyam aśivaṃ $ dānavānāṃ bhayāvaham &

GE07hv_conau:16408: [k: N (except Ś1 K2 Ñ1) T4 G2.4.5 ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conau:16409: sakhībhiḥ sahitā hy ūṣā $ cintayantī sthitā tu sā |
GE07hv_conau:16410: tṛtīye tu muhūrte sā $ naṣṭā bāṇapurāt tadā &

GE07hv_conau:16431: tataḥ praviśya sahasā $ bhavanaṃ tasya tan mahat &

GE07hv_conau:16434: dadarśa madhye nārīṇāṃ % tārāpatim ivoditam // HV_108.2 //
GE07hv_conau:16436: pibantaṃ madhu mādhvīkaṃ % śriyā paramayā yutam \
GE07hv_conau:16438: [k: K Ñ2.3V BD (except D3) T4 G2.4.5 ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conau:16439: vādyate samatālaṃ ca $ gīyate madhuraṃ tathā |
GE07hv_conau:16440: na ca tasya manas tatra $ tam evārtham acintayat || *HV_108.3*1205:2
GE07hv_conau:16441: striyaḥ sarvaguṇopetā $ nṛtyante tatra tatra vai |

GE07hv_conau:17465: etasminn antare rājan $ nāradaḥ prayayau raṇāt |

GE07hv_conau:17470: bāṇaḥ saṃhanyate deva $ kṛṣṇena halinā kila |
GE07hv_conau:17471: tasya sarvam anīkaṃ tu $ bhagnaṃ tan nāvatiṣṭhati ||
GE07hv_conau:17472: kiṃ vartase 'dya niścinto $ bhartas te pīḍyate kila |
GE07hv_conau:17473: kuruṣva tasya sāhāyyaṃ $ bhaktādhīno bhavān iti ||
GE07hv_conau:17476: niśvāsaṃ mumuce rājann $ astaḥ kaś cid vinirgataḥ ||
GE07hv_conau:17477: taṃ kiṃ karomīti haraṃ $ pṛcchantaṃ prāha bhūtapaḥ |

GE07hv_conau:17583: so 'sṛjaj jvaram anyaṃ tu % pūrvajvaravināśanam // HV_111.5 //

GE07hv_conau:17592: jvaraḥ kṛṣṇavisṛṣṭas tu $ gṛhītvā taṃ jvaraṃ balāt |

GE07hv_conau:17596: āvidhya bhūtale cainaṃ $ śatadhā kartum udyataḥ |
GE07hv_conau:17597: vyāghoṣayaj jvaras tatra $ bhoḥ paritrātum arhasi |
GE07hv_conau:17599: māheśvaro vaiṣṇavaś ca $ yuyudhāte jvarāv ubhau |
GE07hv_conau:17601: [k: G4.5 cont.: T1.2 G1.3 M G(ed.) ins. after 5: :k]
GE07hv_conau:17602: kṛṣṇajvaro jvaraṃ pūrvaṃ $ gṛhītvā svena tejasā |
GE07hv_conau:17605: tayos tu tumulaṃ yuddhaṃ $ jvarayor bāhuśālinoḥ || *HV_111.5*1338:4 |
GE07hv_conau:17607: dadṛśuś ca mahad yuddhaṃ $ bhūtāni ca samantataḥ |
GE07hv_conau:17608: tato māheśvaro yuddhe $ tāḍayām āsa vaiṣṇavam |
GE07hv_conau:17610: sa gato vaiṣṇavaṃ rājan $ raudraṃ bhasmāyudhaṃ raṇe |
GE07hv_conau:17611: dvābhyām atha ca bāhubhyāṃ $ gṛhītvātāḍayad balī || *HV_111.5*1338:10
GE07hv_conau:17614: tato raudro jvaro rājan $ muṣṭinātha jaghāna tam |
GE07hv_conau:17615: dadaṃśa dantair bahudhā $ jvaraṃ keśavam āhave || *HV_111.5*1338:14 |
GE07hv_conau:17616: bāhubhyām eva tau rājan $ yuyudhāte mahāgadau |
GE07hv_conau:17618: cakratuś ca mahānādaṃ $ jvarau tau lokaviśrutau |
GE07hv_conau:17620: yatate bahudhā tatra $ muṣṭinātha jaghāna tam |
GE07hv_conau:17621: āhatya bāhunā bhūyo $ niṣpipeṣa punaḥ punaḥ || *HV_111.5*1338:20 |
GE07hv_conau:17624: gṛhītvā tu balād raudram $ ākṛṣya ca punaḥ punaḥ |
GE07hv_conau:17625: kṛṣnāya hṛṣtaḥ prāyacchat $ kiṃ kariṣyāmy ataḥ param ||
GE07hv_conau:17628: utthāya ca hṛṣīkeśo $ jvaraṃ māheśvaraṃ raṇe |
GE07hv_conau:17629: hantum aicchat tadā loko $ nirjvaro 'stv iti keśavaḥ |
GE07hv_conau:17631: aśarīrā tato vāṇī % tam uvācāntarikṣagā // HV_111.6 //
GE07hv_conau:17633: mā vadhīr jvaram etaṃ vai % rakṣaṇīyas tvayānagha \

GE07hv_conau:17638: kṛṣṇasya pādayor mūrdhnā $ śaraṇaṃ so 'gamaj jvaraḥ ||
GE07hv_conau:17640: yo me manorathā deva $ taṃ tvaṃ kuru mahābhuja |

GE07hv_conau:17642: of 1339*: G4.5 M4 G(ed.) after line 1 of 1399*: :k]

GE07hv_conau:17651: namas te cakriṇe nityam $ asihastāya te namaḥ || *HV_111.7*1340:8 |
GE07hv_conau:17653: namas te devadeveśa $ tubhyaṃ deva kapardine || *HV_111.7*1340:10 |
GE07hv_conau:17660: namaḥ sarvātmane deva $ sarvakartre namo namaḥ || *HV_111.7*1340:17 |
GE07hv_conau:17663: viṣṇo tvāṃ sakaleśeśa $ tvāṃ gadādharam avyayam || *HV_111.7*1340:20
GE07hv_conau:17665: iti stutvā jagannāthaṃ $ nṛtyann iva tadā jvaraḥ |

GE07hv_conau:17670: aham eko jvaras tāta $ nānyo loke jvaro bhavet |
GE07hv_conau:17671: tava prasādān nānyaḥ syāj % jvaraḥ samitiśobhana // HV_111.8 //
GE07hv_conau:17672: [k: After 8, K Ñ2.3V BD T4 G5 ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conau:17674: evaṃ bhavatu bhadraṃ te $ yathā tvaṃ jvara kāṅkṣase |
GE07hv_conau:17675: varārthināṃ varo deyo $ bhavāṃś ca śaraṇaṃ gataḥ |
GE07hv_conau:17677: eka eva jvaro loke $ bhavān astu yathāsukham &

GE07hv_conau:17680: prītimāṃś cābhavat kṛṣṇo $ raudrajvaram uvāca ha |
GE07hv_conau:17683: yo 'yaṃ mayā jvaro sṛṣṭo % mayy evaiṣa pralīyatām // HV_111.9 //
GE07hv_conau:17685: [k: After 9, N (except Ś1 Ñ1) T4 G5 G(ed.) ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conau:17687: evam ukte tu vacane $ jvaraṃ prati mahāyaśāḥ |
GE07hv_conau:17688: kṛṣṇaḥ praharatāṃ śreṣṭhaḥ $ punar vākyam uvāca ha ||
GE07hv_conau:17689: śṛṇuṣva jvara saṃdeśaṃ $ yathā loke cariṣyasi |
GE07hv_conau:17691: tridhā vibhajya cātmānaṃ $ matpriyaṃ yadi kāṅkṣase |
GE07hv_conau:17693: tṛtīyo yaś ca te bhāgo $ mānuṣeṣūpapatsyate |
GE07hv_conau:17694: tridhābhūtaṃ vapuḥ kṛtvā $ pakṣiṣu tvaṃ bhava jvara ||
GE07hv_conau:17695: caturdhā yas tṛtīyasya $ bhaviṣyati ca te dhruvam |
GE07hv_conau:17697: mānuṣeṣv atha bhedane $ vasa tvaṃ pravibhajya vai |
GE07hv_conau:17698: jātiṣv athāvaśeṣāsu $ nivasa tvaṃ śṛṇuṣva me || *HV_111.9*1345:12 |
GE07hv_conau:17700: pāṇḍupatraś ca vikhyātaḥ $ phaleṣv āturyam eva ca ||
GE07hv_conau:17701: apāṃ tu nīlikāṃ vidyāc $ chikhodbhedaś ca barhiṇām |
GE07hv_conau:17702: padminīṣu himo bhūtvā $ pṛthivyām api coṣaraḥ || *HV_111.9*1345:16 |
GE07hv_conau:17704: goṣv apasmārako bhūtvā $ khorakaś ca bhaviṣyasi || *HV_111.9*1345:18
GE07hv_conau:17706: darśanāt sparśanāc cāpi $ prāṇināṃ vadham eṣyasi |
GE07hv_conau:17710: kṛṣṇasya vacanaṃ śrutvā $ jvaro hṛṣṭamanā hy abhūt |
GE07hv_conau:17713: bhūyaś ca te vacaḥ kartum $ icchāmi puruṣarṣabha |
GE07hv_conau:17714: tad ājñāpaya govinda $ kiṃ karomi mahābhuja |
GE07hv_conau:17717: evaṃ bhavatu bhadraṃ te $ yathā tvaṃ jvara kākṣase |
GE07hv_conau:17718: [k: K Ñ2.3V BD G5 cont.: T1.2 G1 M ins. after 9: :k]
GE07hv_conau:17725: abhisaṃdhiṃ śṛṇuṣvādya $ yat tvā vakṣyāmi niścayāt |
GE07hv_conau:17727: yuvāṃ jvarau ca bhavatāṃ $ pīḍāyāṃ maraṇe tathā |
GE07hv_conau:17728: pīḍāyāṃ ca bhavān svāmī $ maraṇe māmakas tathā || *HV_111.9*1347:2 |
GE07hv_conau:17729: ihaiva līyatāṃ tāvaj $ jvaro māmaka eva hi |

GE07hv_conau:19010: ya idaṃ śṛṇuyān nityaṃ $ viṣṇubhaktād dvijarṣabhāt |

GE07hv_conau:19029: śaunakādyās tu munayaḥ $ prītās tuṣṭās tadābhavan |

GE07hv_conau:19041: [h: HV (CE) chapter 114, transliterated by Peter Bisschop, version of december 22, 2001
GE07hv_conau:19044: [k: T2 G1 ins. after the ref.: :k]
GE07hv_conau:19046: kasmin pratiṣṭhito vaṃśaḥ % pāṇḍavānāṃ mahātmanām // HV_114.1 //

GE07hv_conau:19054: janamejaya ity eva % kṣatraṃ bhuvi pariśrutam // HV_114.3 //
GE07hv_conau:19055: teṣāṃ jyeṣṭhas tu rājāsīt $ pure vāraṇasāhvaye &
GE07hv_conau:19058: aputraḥ sa tu dharmātmā % praviveśa tapovanam // HV_114.5 //
GE07hv_conau:19060: sucāror duhitā subhrūr % mālinī bhrātṛmālini // HV_114.6 //
GE07hv_conau:19061: sa tv ajanmani garbhasya $ śvetakarṇaḥ prajeśvaraḥ &
GE07hv_conau:19062: anvagacchata taṃ pūrvair % mahāprasthānam acyutam // HV_114.7 //
GE07hv_conau:19063: sā dṛṣṭvā saṃprayātaṃ taṃ $ mālinī pṛṣṭhato 'nvagāt &
GE07hv_conau:19064: pathi sā suṣuve subhrūr % vane rājīvalocanam // HV_114.8 //
GE07hv_conau:19065: tam apāśya ca tatraiva $ rājānaṃ sānvagacchata &
