GE07hv_conau:19439: anirṇiktam avijñātaṃ % dāyādyam iva dhāryate // HV_117.47 //
GE07hv_conau:19440: iṣṭaṃ dānaṃ tapo nāma $ brahmacaryaṃ supūjitam &
GE07hv_conau:19441: guṇaiḥ karmābhinirvṛttir % guṇās tathyena karmaṇā // HV_117.48 //
GE07hv_conau:19443: yuge yuge yathākālam % ṛṣibhiḥ samudāhṛtā // HV_117.49 //
GE07hv_conau:19445: āśiṣaś ca śubhāḥ puṇyās % tathaivāyur yuge yuge // HV_117.50 //
GE07hv_conau:19449: kṣaṇaṃ na saṃtiṣṭhati jīvalokaḥ % kṣayodayābhyāṃ parivartamānaḥ //
GE07hv_conau:19450: [h: HV (CE) chapter 118, transliterated by Peter Bisschop, version of december 29, 2001
GE07hv_conau:19453: atītānāgataṃ vākyam % ṛṣeḥ pariṣadā śrutam // HV_118.1 //
GE07hv_conau:19455: atarpayata tac chotraṃ % maharṣer vāṅmayo rasaḥ // HV_118.2 //
GE07hv_conau:19457: ramaṇīyaṃ tad ākhyānaṃ % kṛtsnaṃ pariṣadā śrutam // HV_118.3 //
GE07hv_conau:19458: kecid aśrūṇi mumucuḥ $ śrutvā dadhyus tathāpare &
GE07hv_conau:19459: itihāsaṃ tam ṛṣiṇā % pārāśaryeṇa darśitam // HV_118.4 //
GE07hv_conau:19463: punar drakṣyāma ity uktvā % jagāma bhagavān ṛṣiḥ // HV_118.5 //
GE07hv_conau:19465: loke pravadatāṃ śreṣṭhaṃ % śiṣṭāḥ sarve tapodhanāḥ // HV_118.6 //
GE07hv_conau:19466: yāte bhagavati vyāse $ viprāḥ saha maharṣibhiḥ &
GE07hv_conau:19467: ṛtvijaḥ pārthivāś caiva % pratijagmur yathāgatam // HV_118.7 //
GE07hv_conau:19469: jagāma roṣam utsṛtya % rājā viṣam ivoragaḥ // HV_118.8 //
GE07hv_conau:19471: āstīko 'py āśramapadaṃ % jagāma ca mahāmuniḥ // HV_118.9 //
GE07hv_conau:19473: anvaśāsac ca muditas % tadā pramuditāḥ prajāḥ // HV_118.10 //
GE07hv_conau:19474: kasyacit tv atha kālasya $ sa rājā janamejayaḥ &
GE07hv_conau:19476: saṃjñaptam aśvaṃ tatrāsya $ devī kāśyā vapuṣṭamā &
GE07hv_conau:19478: tāṃ tu sarvānavadyāṅgīṃ $ cakame vāsavas tadā &
GE07hv_conau:19479: saṃjñaptam aśvaṃ āviśya % tayā miśrībabhūva saḥ // HV_118.13 //
GE07hv_conau:19480: tasmin vikāre janite $ viditvā tattvataś ca tat &
GE07hv_conau:19481: asaṃjñapto 'yam aśvas te % dhvaṃsety adhvaryum abravīt // HV_118.14 //
GE07hv_conau:19483: kathayāmāsa rājarṣeḥ % śaśāpa sa puraṃdaram // HV_118.15 //
GE07hv_conau:19485: yady asti me yajñaphalaṃ $ tapo vā rakṣataḥ prajāḥ &
GE07hv_conau:19486: phalena tena sarveṇa % bravīmi śrūyatām idam // HV_118.16 //
GE07hv_conau:19488: kṣatriyā vājimedhena % na yakṣyantīti śaunaka // HV_118.17 //
GE07hv_conau:19489: ṛtvijaś cābravīt kruddhaḥ $ sa rājā janamejayaḥ &
GE07hv_conau:19490: daurbalyaṃ bhavatām etad % yad ayaṃ dharṣitaḥ kratuḥ // HV_118.18 //
GE07hv_conau:19491: viṣaye me na vastavyaṃ $ dhvaṃsadhvaṃ saha bāndhavaiḥ &
GE07hv_conau:19492: ity uktās tatyajur viprās % taṃ nṛpaṃ jātamanyavaḥ // HV_118.19 //
GE07hv_conau:19496: asatīṃ vapuṣṭamām etāṃ % nirvāsayata me gṛhāt \
GE07hv_conau:19498: yayā me caraṇo mūrdhni bhasmareṇūṣitaḥ kṛtaḥ // HV_118.20 //
GE07hv_conau:19499: śauṇḍīryaṃ me 'nayā bhagnaṃ $ yaśo mānaś ca dūṣitaḥ &
GE07hv_conau:19500: naināṃ draṣṭum apīcchāmi % parikliṣṭām iva srajam // HV_118.21 //
GE07hv_conau:19501: na svādu so 'śnāti naraḥ $ sukhaṃ svapiti vā rahaḥ &
GE07hv_conau:19502: anvāste yaḥ priyāṃ bhāryāṃ % pareṇa mṛditām iha // HV_118.22 //
GE07hv_conau:19503: [k: D5 (marg.) Bom. Poona eds. G (ed.) ins.: :k]
GE07hv_conau:19505: evam uccaiḥ prabhāṣantaṃ $ kruddhaṃ pārikṣitaṃ nṛpam &
GE07hv_conau:19506: gandharvarājaḥ provāca % viśvāvasur idaṃ vācaḥ // HV_118.23 //
GE07hv_conau:19508: na duṣyatīyaṃ patnī te % vihiteyaṃ vapuṣṭamā // HV_118.24 //
GE07hv_conau:19511: yajñe vivaram āsādya $ vighnam indreṇa te kṛtam &
GE07hv_conau:19512: yajvā hy asi kuruśreṣṭha % samṛddhyā vāsavopamaḥ // HV_118.26 //
GE07hv_conau:19513: bibhety abhibhavāc chakras $ tava kratuphalair nṛpa &
GE07hv_conau:19514: tasmād āvartitaś caiva % kratur indreṇa te vibho // HV_118.27 //
GE07hv_conau:19516: yajñe vivaram āsādya % saṃjñaptaṃ dṛśya vājinam \
GE07hv_conau:19517: ratim indreṇa rambhāyāṃ manyase yāṃ vapuṣṭamām // HV_118.28 //
GE07hv_conau:19519: bhraṃśitas tvaṃ ca viprāś ca % phalād indrasamād iha \
GE07hv_conau:19521: bibheti hi sadā tvatto $ brāhmaṇebhyo 'pi vāsavaḥ &
GE07hv_conau:19522: ekena vai tad ubhayaṃ % tīrṇaṃ śakreṇa māyayā // HV_118.30 //
GE07hv_conau:19524: katham anyair anācīrṇaṃ % naptur dārān atikramet // HV_118.31 //
GE07hv_conau:19525: yathaiva hi parā buddhiḥ $ paro dharmaḥ paro damaḥ &
GE07hv_conau:19528: mā vāsavaṃ mā ca gurum $ ātmāṇaṃ mā vapuṣtamām &
GE07hv_conau:19529: gaccha doṣeṇa kālo hi % sarvathā duratikramaḥ // HV_118.33 //
GE07hv_conau:19534: apāpās tyajyamānā vai $ śapeyur api yoṣitaḥ &
GE07hv_conau:19535: aduṣṭās tu striyo rājan % divyās tu saviśeṣataḥ // HV_118.36 //
GE07hv_conau:19536: bhānoḥ prabhā śikhā vahner $ vedīhotre tathāhutiḥ &
GE07hv_conau:19538: grāhyā lālayitavyāś ca $ pūjyāś ca satataṃ budhaiḥ &
GE07hv_conau:19539: śīlavatyo namaskāryāḥ % pūjyāḥ striya iva striyaḥ // HV_118.38 //
GE07hv_conau:19541: evaṃ sa viśvāvasunānunītaḥ $ prasādam āgamya vapuṣṭamāyām &
GE07hv_conau:19542: cakāra mithyāvyatiśaṅkitātmā % śāntiṃ parāṃ tatra sa dharmajuṣṭām //
GE07hv_conau:19543: śramam abhivinivartya mānasaṃ sa $ samabhilaṣajjanamejayo yaśaḥ svam &
GE07hv_conau:19544: viṣayam anuśaśāsa dharmabuddhir % muditamanā ramayan vapuṣṭamāṃ tām //
GE07hv_conau:19545: na ca viramati viprapūjanān $ na ca vinivartati yajñaśīlanāt &
GE07hv_conau:19546: na ca viṣayaparirakṣaṇāc cyuto 'sau % na ca parigarhati vapuṣṭamāṃ ca //
GE07hv_conau:19547: vidhivihitam aśakyam anyathā hi kartum $ yad ṛṣir acintyatapāḥ purābravīt saḥ &
GE07hv_conau:19549: na ca tad aśakyam anyathā hi kartum |
GE07hv_conau:19550: iti narapatir ātmavāṃs tadāsau % tad anuvicintya babhūva vītamanyuḥ //
GE07hv_conau:19552: iti nṛpatir adīnavikramas $ tad anuvicintya babhūva nirvṛtaḥ |
GE07hv_conau:19553: idaṃ mahākāvyam ṛṣer mahātmanaḥ $ paṭhan nṛṇāṃ pūjyatamo bhaven naraḥ &
GE07hv_conau:19554: prakṛṣṭam āyuḥ samavāpya durlabhaṃ % labheta sarvajñaphalaṃ ca kevalam //
GE07hv_conau:19555: śatakratoḥ kalmaṣavipramokṣaṇaṃ $ paṭhan idam mucyati kalmaṣān naraḥ &
GE07hv_conau:19556: tathaiva kāmān vividhān samaśnute % samāptakāmaś ca cirāya nandati //
GE07hv_conau:19557: yathā hi puṣpaprabhavaṃ phalaṃ drumāt $ tataḥ prajāyanti punaś ca pādapāḥ &
GE07hv_conau:19558: tathā maharṣiprabhavā imā giraḥ % pravardhayante tam ṛṣiṃ pravartitāḥ //
GE07hv_conau:19559: putrān aputro labhate suvarcasaś $ cyutaḥ punar vindati cātmanaḥ sthitim &
GE07hv_conau:19560: vyādhiṃ na cāpnoti ciraṃ ca bandhanaṃ % kriyāṃ ca puṇyāṃ labhate guṇānvitaḥ // HV_118.46 //
GE07hv_conau:19561: patim upalabhate ca satsu kanyā $ śravaṇam upetya śubhā munes tu vācaḥ &
GE07hv_conau:19562: janayati ca sutān guṇair upetān % ripujanamardanavīryaśālinaś ca //
GE07hv_conau:19563: vijayati vasudhāṃ ca kṣatravṛttir $ dhanam atulaṃ labhate dviṣajjayaṃ ca &
GE07hv_conau:19564: vipulam api dhanaṃ labhec ca vaiśyaḥ % sugatim iyāc chravaṇāc ca śūdrajātiḥ // HV_118.48 //
GE07hv_conau:19565: purāṇam etac caritaṃ mahātmanām $ adhītya buddhiṃ labhate ca naiṣṭhikīm &
GE07hv_conau:19566: vihāya duḥkhāni vimuktasaṅgaḥ % sa vītarāgo vicared vasuṃdharām //
GE07hv_conau:19567: ity etad ākhyānam udāhṛtaṃ vaḥ $ pratismaranto dvijamaṇḍaleṣu &
GE07hv_conau:19568: sthairyeṇa jātena punaḥ smarantaḥ % sukhaṃ bhavanto vicarantu lokam //
GE07hv_conau:19569: iti caritam idaṃ mahātmanām $ ṛṣikṛtam adbhutavīryakarmaṇām &
GE07hv_conau:19570: kathitam idaṃ hi samāsavistaraiḥ % kim aparam icchasi kiṃ bravīmi te //
